content: Ataa, Xej, Enaus,
Khenaa, Mahalalee, Yale,
Enauj, Methuxela, Lame,
Nau‑a, Xeeb, Haa, Yafe.
Yafe cov tub yog Kaumaw, Makau, Mantai, Yavaa, Thunpaa, Mese hab Thila.
Kaumaw cov tub yog Akhena, Ntifa hab Thaukama.
Yavaa cov tub yog Elisas, Thasi, Khithi hab Launtani.
Haa cov tub yog Khuj, Iyi, Phuj hab Khana‑aa.
Khuj cov tub yog Xenpa, Havila, Xatha, La‑ama hab Xathekha. La‑ama le tub yog Senpa hab Ntentaa.
Khuj yog Nilauj txwv. Nilauj yog thawj tug kws sab luj sab tuab huv nplajteb.
Iyi  yog cov tuabneeg nuav lub keeb, yog cov Lunti, cov Anami, cov Lehanpi, cov Nathuhi,
cov Paluxi, cov Khaluhi (cov tuabneeg Filixatee yog tshwm ntawm cov Khaluhi lug) hab cov Khathauli.
Khana‑aa yog cov nuav lub keeb, Xaintoo kws yog nwg tug tub hlub hab Hej,
hab cov Yenpu, cov Amaulai, cov Kawkasi,
cov Hivai, cov Akhi, cov Xini,
cov Alava, cov Xemaw hab cov Hama.
Xeeb cov tub yog Elaa, Asu, Apasa, Lus, Alaa, Us, Hoo, Kethaw hab Mese.
Apasa yog Sela txwv. Sela yog Enpaw txwv.
Enpaw muaj ob tug tub, ib tug hu ua Pele  (tsua qhov lub swjhawm kws Pele nyob hov tej tuabneeg txawm faib teb faib chaw). Pele tug kwv hu ua Yaujthaa.
Yaujthaa yog cov nuav txwv, Amaunta, Seleb, Haxamave, Yela,
Hantaulaa, Uxaa, Ntila,
Enpaa, Anpima‑ee, Senpa,
Aufi, Havila hab Yaunpam. Cov nuav puavleej yog Yaujthaa cov tub ki xeeb ntxwv.
Xeeb, Apasa, Sela,
Enpaw, Pele, Le‑u,
Xelu, Nahau, Thela,
Aplaa kws yog Aplahaa.
Aplahaa le tub yog Yiha hab Yisama‑ee.
Puab tej caaj ceg yog le nuav, Nenpayau kws yog Yisama‑ee tug tub hlub hab Khenta, Anpe‑ee, Mixaa,
Misama, Ntuma, Maxas, Hanta, Thema,
Yethu, Nafi hab Khentema. Cov nuav yog Yisama‑ee cov tub.
Khethula kws yog Aplahaa tug nam yau cov tub yog le nuav, nwg yug Xilaa, Yaujsaa, Mentaa, Mintee, Isanpas hab Su‑a. Yaujsaa le tub yog Senpa hab Ntentaa.
Mintee cov tub yog Efa, Efaw, Hanau, Anpinta hab Eenta‑a. Cov nuav puavleej yog Khethula caaj ceg.
Aplahaa yog Yiha txwv. Yiha le tub yog Exau hab Yixayee.
Exau cov tub yog Elifa, Le‑u‑ee, Ye‑u, Yalaa hab Khaula.
Elifa cov tub yog Themaa, Auma, Xefi, Kathaa, Khena, Thina hab Amalej.
Le‑u‑ee cov tub yog Nahaj, Xelag, Sama hab Mixa.
Xe‑i cov tub yog Lauthaa, Saunpaa, Xinpe‑oo, Anas, Ntisoo, Exaw hab Ntisaa.
Lauthaa le tub yog Hauli hab Haumaa. Lauthaa tug muam yog Thina.
Saunpaa cov tub yog Aliyaa, Manaha, Enpaa, Sefi hab Aunaa. Xinpe‑oo cov tub yog Aiyag hab Anas.
Anas tug tub yog Ntisoo, Ntisoo cov tub yog Haalaa, Esanpaa, Ithalaa hab Khelaa.
Exaw cov tub yog Npihaa, Xavaa hab Ya‑akhaa. Ntisaa cov tub yog Us hab Alaaj.
Ntawm nuav yog cov vaajntxwv kws kaav huv Entoo tebchaws yog kaav ua ntej thau u kws cov Yixayee tsw tau muaj vaajntxwv. Npe‑au tug tub Npela. Nwg lub moos hu ua Ntihanpa.
Thaus Npela tuag lawd Xelag tug tub Yaunpam kws yog tuabneeg huv lub moos Npauxa nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Yaunpam tuag lawd Husaa kws nyob huv cov tuabneeg Themaa tebchaws nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Husaa tuag lawd Npenta tug tub Hanta kws yog tug kws ntaus yeej cov Mintee huv Mau‑a tebchaws nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav, nwg lub moos hu ua Avij.
Thaus Hanta tuag lawd Xaala kws yog tuabneeg huv Malekha nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Xaala tuag lawd Sa‑u kws yog tuabneeg huv Lehaunpau kws nyob ntawm ntug dej Yufeti nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Sa‑u tuag lawd Anpau tug tub Npa‑aa Hanaa nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Npa‑aa Hanaa tuag lawd Hanta nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav. Nwg lub moos hu ua Pa‑i, nwg tug quaspuj hu ua Mehethanpee, kws yog Maleb tug ntxhais. Maleb yog Mexaha le ntxhais.
Mas Hanta tuag lawm. Entoo cov thawj coj yog Thina, Aliya, Yethe,
Auhaulinpama, Ela, Pinoo,
Khena, Themaa, Mixas,
Manti‑ee hab Ilaa. Cov nuav yog Entoo cov thawj coj.
Yixayee cov tub yog le nuav, Lunpee, Xime‑oo, Levi, Yuta, Ixakha, Xenpuloo,
Ntaaj, Yauxej, Npeeyamee, Nathali, Kas hab Asaw.
Yuta cov tub yog Ws, Auna hab Sela. Peb tug nuav yog Npasuva kws yog tuabneeg Khana‑aa yug rua nwg. Yawmsaub pum tas Ws kws yog Yuta tug tub hlub phem kawg le, Yawmsaub txhad muab nwg tua lawm.
Yuta tug nyaab Thama yug Peles hab Xelag rua nwg. Yuta muaj tub huvsw tswb leeg.
Peles cov tub yog Hexaloo hab Hamu.
Xelag cov tub yog Xili, Etha, Hemaa, Khakhau hab Ntala, huvsw tswb leeg.
Khami tug tub yog Akhaa kws coj kev kub ntxhuv lug rua cov Yixayee vem nwg muab tej hov txhua chaw kws muab cais rua Vaajtswv lawd lug zais ca.
Etha tug tub yog Axaliya.
Hexaloo cov tub kws nwg muaj yog le nuav, Yelame‑ee, Laa hab Khelunpai.
Laa yog Aminanta txwv, Aminanta yog Nasoo txwv, Nasoo yog tug thawj huv Yuta cov tub.
Nasoo yog Xama txwv, Xama yog Npau‑a txwv,
Npau‑a yog Aunpe txwv, Aunpe yog Yexi txwv.
Yexi cov tub mas Elia yog nwg tub hlub, Anpinanta yog tug ob, Sime‑a yog tug peb,
Nethanee yog tug plaub, Lantai yog tug tswb,
Auxee yog tug rau, Tavi yog tug xyaa.
Hab puab ob tug muam yog Xeluya hab Anpikayi. Xeluya muaj peb tug tub, yog Anpisai, Yau‑a hab Axahee.
Anpikayi yug Amaxa. Amaxa txwv yog Yethaw kws yog tuabneeg Yisama‑ee.
Hexaloo tug tub Khalej ib tug quaspuj yog Axunpa, ib tug yog Yeli‑au. Axunpa cov tub yog Yesaw, Saunpam hab Antoo.
Thaus Axunpa tuag lawm Khalej yuav Efatha kws yug Hawj rua nwg.
Hawj yog Uli txwv, Uli yog Npexalee txwv.
Dhau hov thaus Hexaloo noob nyoog muaj rau caum xyoo nwg yuav Makhi kws yog Kile‑a txwv tug ntxhais ua quaspuj mas yug tau Xeku rua Hexaloo.
Xeku yog Ya‑i txwv, Ya‑i muaj neeg nkaum peb lub moos huv Kile‑a tebchaws.

Tassws cov tuabneeg Kesu hab cov tuabneeg Alaa txeeb tau lub moos Havauya‑i hab lub moos Khenaj hab tej zej zog ib ncig, huvsw rau caum lub moos. Cov nuav huvsw yog Makhi kws yog Kile‑a txwv caaj ceg.
Thaus Hexaloo tuag huv lub moos Khalej Efatha lawm, Hexaloo tug quaspuj Anpiya yug tau Asu kws yog Thekhau‑a txwv.
Hexaloo tug tub hlub Yelame‑ee le tub yog le nuav, Laa yog tug tub hlub, hab Npuna, Aulee, Auxee hab Ahiya.
Yelame‑ee muaj dua ib tug quaspuj lub npe hu ua Athala. Nwg yog Aunaa nam.
Yelame‑ee tug tub hlub Laa cov tub yog Ma‑as, Yami hab Ekhaw.
Aunaa cov tub yog Samai hab Yanta. Samai cov tub yog Nanta hab Anpisu.
Anpisu tug quaspuj hu ua Anpiha‑i, mas nwg yug tau Anpaa hab Mauli rua Anpisu.
Nanta cov tub yog Xele hab Apa‑i. Thaus Xele tuag nwg tsw muaj mivnyuas.
Apa‑i tug tub yog Isi. Isi tug tub yog Sesaa, Sesaa tug tub yog Alai.
Samai tug kwv Yanta le tub yog Yethaw hab Yaunathaa, mas thaus Yethaw tuag nwg tsw muaj mivnyuas.
Yaunathaa cov tub yog Pelej hab Xaxa. Cov nuav yog Yelame‑ee caaj ceg.
Sesaa tsw muaj tub nwg muaj ntxhais xwb. Sesaa muaj ib tug qhev yog tuabneeg Iyi hu ua Yaha.
Sesaa txawm muab nwg tug ntxhais rua nwg tug qhev Yaha yuav ua quaspuj, mas yug tau Athai.
Athai yog Nathaa txwv, Nathaa yog Xanpa txwv,
Xanpa yog Efaa txwv, Efaa yog Aunpe txwv,
Aunpe yog Yehu txwv, Yehu yog Axaliya txwv,
Axaliya yog Helexi txwv, Helexi yog Ele‑axa txwv,
Ele‑axa yog Xixamai txwv, Xixamai yog Salu txwv,
Salu yog Yekhamiya txwv, Yekhamiya yog Elisama txwv.
Yelame‑ee tug kwv Khalej le tub yog le nuav, nwg tug tub hlub Mesa yog Xi txwv, Xi yog Malesa txwv, Malesa yog Heploo txwv.
Heploo cov tub yog Khaula, Thapuva, Lekhee hab Sema.
Sema yog Lahaa txwv, Lahaa yog Yaukhe‑aa txwv. Lekhee yog Samai txwv.
Samai tug tub yog Ma‑oo, Ma‑oo yog Npexuv txwv.
Khalej tug nam yau Efa yug Halaa, Mauxa hab Kaxe. Halaa yog Kaxe txwv.
Yantai cov tub yog Lekee, Yauthaa, Kesaa, Peleb, Efa hab Sa‑a.
Khalej tug nam yau Ma‑akha yug tau Senpaw hab Thihana.
Nwg yug Sa‑a kws yog Mamana txwv, hab Seva kws yog Manpena hab Kinpe‑a txwv. Khalej tug ntxhais yog Axav.
Cov nuav yog Khalej caaj ceg. Efatha tug tub hlub Hawj cov tub yog Saunpaa kws yog Khiliya Ye‑ali txwv,
Xama kws yog Npelehee txwv, hab Hale kws yog Npekantaw txwv.
Khiliya Ye‑ali txwv Saunpaa kuj muaj dua tub yog Halau‑e hab cov Menuhau ib nraab.
Khiliya Ye‑ali cov quas cum yog cum Ithala, cum Puthai, cum Suma hab cum Mila. Ntawm cov cum nuav muaj cov tuabneeg Xaula hab cov tuabneeg Etha‑oo tshwm lug.
Xama cov tub yog Npelehee, cov Nethaufa, Athau Npeyau‑a hab cum Manaha ib nraab hab cov Xaula.
Cov nuav yog cov tub teev ntawv kws nyob huv lub moos Yanpes tej cum, yog cum Thila, cum Sime‑as hab cum Xukha. Cov nuav yog cov Khenai kws lug ntawm Hama kws yog cov Lekhaj txwv.
Tavi cov tub kws yug rua huv Heploo yog le nuav. Nwg tug tub hlub yog Aanoo kws Ahinau‑aa huv Yile‑ee yug. Tug ob yog Taniyee kws Anpikayi huv Khamee yug.
Tug peb yog Axaloo. Nwg nam yog Ma‑akha kws yog cov Kesu tug vaajntxwv Thaamai tug ntxhais. Tug plaub yog Antauniya. Nwg nam yog Hakis.
Tug tswb yog Sefathiya kws Anpithaa yug. Tug rau yog Ile‑aa kws Tavi tug quaspuj Elag yug.
Rau tug nuav puavleej yug huv lub moos Heploo. Tavi nyob qhov ntawd kaav tau xyaa xyoo hab rau lub hli. Nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalee kaav tau peb caug peb xyoos.
Tavi cov tub kws yug rua huv Yeluxalee yog le nuav, Sime‑a, Saunpam, Nathaa hab Xalaumoo. Plaub tug nuav yog Ami‑ee tug ntxhais Npasuva  yug.
Hab Iha, Elisama, Elifele,
Nauka, Nefe, Yafia,
Elisama, Eliyanta, Elifele, huvsw yog cuaj leeg.
Cov nuav puavleej yog Tavi cov tub kws tsw suav nwg cov hluas nkauj tej tub. Hab Thama yog puab le muam.
Xalaumoo caaj ceg yog le nuav. Xalaumoo tug tub yog Lehaunpau‑aa, Lehaunpau‑aa tug tub yog Anpiya, Anpiya tug tub yog Axa, Axa tug tub yog Yehausafa,
Yehausafa tug tub yog Yaulaa, Yaulaa tug tub yog Ahaxiya, Ahaxiya tug tub yog Yau‑as,
Yau‑as tug tub yog Amaxiya, Amaxiya tug tub yog Axaliya, Axaliya tug tub yog Yauthaa,
Yauthaa tug tub yog Aha, Aha tug tub yog Hexekhiya, Hexekhiya tug tub yog Manaxe,
Manaxe tug tub yog Amoo, Amoo tug tub yog Yauxiya.
Yauxiya cov tub mas tug hlub yog Yauhanaa, tug ob yog Yehauyakhi, tug peb yog Xentekhiya, tug plaub yog Salu.
Yehauyakhi caaj ceg yog le nuav, nwg tug tub yog Yekhauniya,  Yekhauniya tug tub yog Xentekhiya.
Yekhauniya kws raug nteg coj moog le tub yog Se‑athi‑ee,
Makhilaa, Pentaya, Senaxa, Yekhamiya, Hausama hab Nentanpiya.
Pentaya cov tub yog Xelunpanpee hab Sime‑i. Xelunpanpee cov tub yog Mesulaa hab Hananiya, hab ob tug le muam hu ua Selaumi.
Hab Hasunpa, Auhee, Npelekhiya, Haxantiya hab Yusahexe, huvsw tswb leeg.
Hananiya cov tub yog Pelathiya hab Yesaya. Yesaya tug tub yog Lefaya, Lefaya tug tub yog Alanaa, Alanaa tug tub yog Aunpantiya, Aunpantiya tug tub yog Sekhaniya.
Sekhaniya tug tub yog Semaya. Semaya cov tub yog Hathu, Ikaa, Npaliya, Ne‑aliya hab Safa, huvsw rau leej.
Ne‑aliya cov tub yog Eli‑aunai, Hikhiyas hab Alikhaa, huvsw peb tug.
Eli‑aunai cov tub yog Hauntaviya, Eliyasi, Pelaya, Akhu, Yauhanaa, Ntelaya hab Anani, huvsw xyaa leej.
Yuta cov tub yog Peles, Hexaloo, Khami, Hawj hab Saunpaa.
Saunpaa tug tub Le‑aya yog Yahas txwv, Yahas yog Ahumai hab Laha txwv. Cov nuav yog cov Xaula cov quas cum.
Cov nuav yog Etaa le tub, Yile‑ee, Isama hab Inpa. Puab tug muam hu ua Haxeleephauni.
Penu‑ee yog Kentau txwv hab Exaw yog Husa txwv. Cov nuav yog Hawj cov tub. Hawj yog Efatha tug tub hlub, Efatha yog tug kws rhawv lub moos Npelehee.
Asu kws yog Thekhau‑a txwv muaj ob tug quaspuj, yog Hela hab Na‑ala.
Na‑ala yug tau tub rua nwg yog Ahuxaa, Hefaw, Themeni hab Ha‑ahathali. Cov nuav yog Na‑ala le tub.
Hela cov tub yog Xeleg, Ixaha hab Ethanaa.
Khau yog Anuj hab Xaunpenpa le txwv hab yog Halu tug tub Ahahee cov quas cum lub keeb.
Yanpes yog tug kws muaj meej thawb dua nwg cov kwvtij. Nwg nam tis nwg lub npe hu ua Yanpes  has tas, “Kuv yug nwg mas mob heev.”

Yanpes thov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv tas, “Thov koj foom koob moov rua kuv hab nthuav kuv tug nrwm teb kuas daav, hab thov koj nrug nraim kuv hab thov koj tsom kwm kuv kuas dim tej kev phem kuv txhad tsw raug mob.” Mas Vaajtswv kuj pub lawv le nwg tau thov.
Suha tug tijlaug Khelub yog Mehi txwv. Mehi yog Ethoo txwv.
Ethoo yog Npelafa, Paxe‑a hab Thehina txwv. Thehina yog Inaha txwv. Cov nuav yog cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Lekhas.
Khena cov tub yog Auni‑ee hab Xelaya. Auni‑ee cov tub yog Hathaj hab Me‑aunauthai.
Me‑aunauthai yog Aufa txwv, Xelaya yog Yau‑a txwv. Yau‑a yog cov Kehalasi txwv, lub npe hu ua Kehalasi  tsua qhov puab suavdawg yog cov nam Kws txawj ua num.
Yefune tug tub Khalej cov tub yog Ilu, Ela hab Na‑aa. Ela le tub yog Khena.
Yehalelee cov tub yog Xi, Xifa, Thiliya hab Axalee.
Exalas cov tub yog Yethaw, Melej, Efaw hab Yaloo. Melej yuav Npithiya kws yog Falau tug ntxhais, nwg xeeb tub hab yug tau Mili‑aa, Samai hab Isanpa kws yog Ethemau‑a txwv.
Hab Melej yuav ib tug Yutai ua quaspuj mas yug tau Yele kws yog Kentau txwv, hab Henpaw kws yog Xaukhau txwv, hab Yekhuthi‑ee kws yog Xanau‑a txwv.
Hauntiya tug quaspuj kws yog Nahaa tug muam le tub yug tau Khe‑ila kws yog tuabneeg Kamai, hab Ethemau‑a kws yog tuabneeg Ma‑akha.
Simoo cov tub yog Aanoo, Libna, Npeehanaa hab Thiloo. Isi cov tub yog Xauhe hab Npeexauhe.
Yuta tug tub Sela cov tub yog Ws kws yog Lekha txwv hab La‑anta kws yog Malesa txwv, hab tej quas yim Kws txawj ntus ntaub maag huv lub moos Npe Anpe‑a,
hab Yaukhi hab cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Khauxenpa hab Yau‑as hab Xalaj kws kaav huv Mau‑a tebchaws hab lub moos Yasunpi Lehee. (Cov kws sau taag nuav tub muab sau ca rua thau u lawm).
Cov nuav yog cov Kws puab laujkaub nyob huv lub moos Netha‑i hab Kentela. Puab nrug vaajntxwv nyob hov ntawd ua vaajntxwv teg num.
Xime‑oo cov tub yog Nemu‑ee, Yami, Yali, Xelag, Sa‑u.
Sa‑u tug tub yog Salu, Salu tug tub yog Mixaa, Mixaa tug tub yog Misama.
Misama cov tub yog Hamu‑ee, Hamu‑ee tug tub yog Xakaw, Xakaw tug tub yog Sime‑i.
Sime‑i muaj kaum rau leej tub hab rau leej ntxhais. Tassws Sime‑i cov kwvtij tsw muaj mivnyuas coob, mas puab cov quas cum txhad tsw fuam vaam coob le xeem Yuta.
Puab nyob huv lub moos Npe‑awsenpa, Maulanta, Haxasu‑aa,
Npiha, Exee, Thaulas,
Npethu‑ee, Hauma, Xilaj,
Npe Makhanpau, Haxaxuxi, Npenpili hab Sa‑ala‑i. Tej moos nuav yog puab le moos moog txug thaus Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Puab tej zej zog yog Etaa, Ayi, Limoo, Thaukhee hab Asaa, huvsw tswb lub moos,
hab tej zej zog kws nyob puag ncig tej moos hov moog txug ncua lub moos Npa‑aa. Cov nuav yog puab tej chaw nyob, hab puab muaj ntaub ntawv kws sau puab tej quas yim le keeb kwm ca.
Mesaunpa, Yaalej, Yausa kws yog Amaxiya le tub,
Yau‑ee, Yehu kws yog Yausinpiya tug tub, Yausinpiya yog Xelaya tug tub hab yog Axi‑ee le xeeb ntxwv,
Eli‑aunai, Ya‑akhaunpa, Yesauhaya, Axaya, Anti‑ee, Yeximi‑ee, Npenaya,
hab Sifi tug tub Xixas. Sifi yog Aaloo tug tub, Aaloo yog Yentaya tug tub, Yentaya yog Simi tug tub, Simi yog Semaya tug tub.
Cov kws has npe taag nuav ua thawj huv puab cov quas cum, hab puab tej ceg kuj fuam vaam coob kawg le.
Puab tswv moog rua ntawm txujkev kws nkaag moog rua huv lub moos Kentau, moog txug ntawm lub haav saab nub tuaj moog nrhav tshaav zaub rua puab tej yaaj tej tshws noj.
Puab nrhav tau lub tshaav zaub zoo heev kws zoo yug yaaj yug tshws, hab lub tebchaws daav ntsag quas tu hab tsw muaj kev kub ntxhuv, tsua qhov cov qub tuabneeg kws nyob ua ntej yog Haa caaj ceg.

Cov kws muaj npe sau ca nuav tau lug nyob rua lub swjhawm kws Hexekhiya ua vaajntxwv kaav Yuta, mas puab ua rua cov qub tuabneeg hab cov tuabneeg Me‑uni kws nyob hov ntawd tej tsev ntaub puam tsuaj taag huvsw, hab ntxuav kuas puab tu noob txug naj nub nwgnuav. Mas puab nyob cov qub tuabneeg tej chaw, vem yog hov ntawd muaj tshaav zaub zoo yug puab tej yaaj tej tshws.
Puab cov ntawd tswb puas leej kws yog xeem Xime‑oo moog peg lub roob Xe‑i. Cov kws coj puab yog Pelathiya, Ne‑aliya, Lefaya hab Uxi‑ee kws yog Isi cov tub.
Puab ua kuas cov tuabneeg Amalej kws tswv dim es tseed tshuav nyob puam tsuaj taag, mas puab nyob qhov ntawd txug naj nub nwgnuav.

Nuav yog has txug Lunpee kws yog Yixayee tug tub hlub cov tub. Txawm yog Lunpee yog tug tub hlub los vem qhov kws nwg tau nrug nwg txwv nam yau pw  mas nwg le feem kws ua tug tub hlub txhad le muab rua Yixayee tug tub Yauxej ob tug tub. Yog le ntawd txhad tsw sau Lunpee lub npe rua huv phoo ntawv kws sau keeb kwm lawv le qhov kws nwg yog tug tub hlub.
Txawm yog Yuta muaj zug dhau nwg tej kwvtij hab muaj ib tug thawj kaav tshwm ntawm nwg lug, los feem kws ua tub hlub yog Yauxej le lawm.
Lunpee kws yog Yixayee tug tub hlub cov tub yog Hanau, Palu, Hexaloo hab Khami.
Yau‑ee cov tub yog Semaya kws yog Yau‑ee tug tub, Semaya tug tub yog Kau, Kau tug tub yog Sime‑i,
Sime‑i tug tub yog Mikha, Mikha tug tub yog Le‑aya, Le‑aya tug tub yog Npa‑aa,
Npa‑aa tug tub yog Npe‑ela, yog tug kws Axilia tug vaajntxwv Thikapinexaw tau kuav coj moog nyob lwm tebchaws. Npe‑ela yog ib tug thawj huv xeem Lunpee.
Huv phoo ntawv kws sau puab le keeb kwm, mas nwg cov kwvtij lawv le puab tej quas cum yog le nuav. Tug thawj yog Ye‑i‑ee, hab Xekhaliya,
hab Axaj tug tub Npela. Axaj yog Sema tug tub, Sema yog Yau‑ee tug tub. Puab nyob huv lub tebchaws Alau‑aw moog txug lub moos Nenpau hab Npa‑aa Me‑oo.
Puab kuj nyob saab nub tuaj moog txug ntawm ntug ntuj nraag teb do kws nyob ntawm tug nam dej Yufeti saab tim nuav, tsua qhov puab tej tsaj txhu fuam vaam coob coob rua huv tebchaws Kile‑a.

Lub swjhawm kws Xa‑u ua vaajntxwv kaav puab tau ua rog rua cov tuabneeg Haka, mas cov Haka tuag rua puab teg, mas puab txhad nyob huv puab tej tsev ntaub thoob plhawv lub tebchaws kws nyob ntawm Kile‑a saab nub tuaj.
Kas cov tub ki nyob npuas nkaus xeem Lunpee huv tebchaws Npasaa moog txug lub moos Xalekha.
Yau‑ee yog tug thawj, Safas yog tug ob, hab muaj Yanai hab Safa huv Npasaa.
Hab puab cov kwvtij lawv le puab tej quas cum, yog Mikha‑ee, Mesulaa, Senpa, Yaulai, Yakhaa, Xi‑a hab Enpaw, huvsw xyaa leej.

Cov nuav yog Anpiha‑i cov tub. Anpiha‑i yog Huli tug tub, Huli yog Yalau‑a tug tub, Yalau‑a yog Kile‑a tug tub, Kile‑a yog Mikha‑ee tug tub, Mikha‑ee yog Yesisai tug tub, Yesisai yog Yantau tug tub, Yantau yog Npub tug tub.
Ahi kws yog Anti‑ee tug tub hab yog Kuni tug xeeb ntxwv yog tug thawj huv puab cum.
Mas puab nyob huv Kile‑a hab Npasaa hab huv Npasaa tej moos hab tej tshaav zaub huvsw thoob plawg huv Saloo tebchaws.
Cov nuav suavdawg puab tau nce npe lawv le puab caaj ceg le keeb kwm rua thaus Yauthaa ua vaajntxwv kaav Yuta huas Yelaunpau‑aa ua vaajntxwv kaav Yixayee.
Xeem Lunpee hab xeem Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe muaj tub rog sab luj sab tuab kws tuav daim phaj hlau hab raab ntaaj hab txawj tua neev nti txawj ua rog 44,760 leej npaaj txhwj yuav ua rog.
Puab ua rog rua cov Haka, Yethu, Nafi hab Naunta.

Thaus Vaajtswv paab puab mas cov Haka hab cov kws nrug cov Haka nyob poob rua huv puab txhais teg, vem puab tau thov hu Vaajtswv rua thaus puab ua rog mas nwg teb puab tej lug thov tsua qhov puab tso sab rua nwg.
Puab txeeb tau cov Haka tej tsaj txhu moog, yog ntxhuav 50,000 tug, yaaj 250,000 tug hab neeg luav 2,000 tug, hab nteg tau tuabneeg 100,000 leej.
Cov Haka tuag coob tsua qhov zag rog nuav yog lug ntawm Vaajtswv lug. Puab nyob huv cov Haka tej chaw moog txug thaus puab poob tebchaws.
Xeem Manaxe ib nraab nyob huv lub tebchaws hov. Puab muaj coob nyob txwj ntawm Npasaa moog txug ncua lub moos Npa‑aa Hawmoo hab Xeni hab lub roob Hawmoo.

Cov thawj huv puab cov quas cum yog le nuav, yog Efaw, Isi, Eli‑ee, Axali‑ee, Yelemi, Hauntaviya hab Yanti‑ee. Puab yog tub rog sab luj sab tuab, muaj suab muaj npe ua cov thawj huv puab cov quas cum.
Tassws puab faav xeeb rua puab tej laug tug Vaajtswv. Puab moog deev cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov tej daab, yog cov tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv tau ua kuas puam tsuaj tom puab hauv ntej lawm.

Yixayee tug Vaajtswv txhad tshoov cov Axilia tug vaajntxwv Pu lub sab (Pu yog Axilia tug vaajntxwv Thikapinexaw) mas nwg txhad muab xeem Lunpee, xeem Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe kuav moog hab coj puab moog rua lub moos Halas hab Hanpau hab Hala hab moog txug tug dej Kauxaa nyob txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Levi cov tub yog Kawsoo, Khauha hab Melali.
Khauha cov tub yog Alaav, Ixaha, Heploo hab Uxi‑ee.
Alaav le mivnyuas yog Aloo, Mauxe hab Mili‑aa. Aloo cov tub yog Nanta, Anpihu, Ele‑axa hab Ithama.
Ele‑axa yog Fineha txwv, Fineha yog Anpisuva txwv.
Anpisuva yog Npukhi txwv, Npukhi yog Uxi txwv,
Uxi yog Xelahiya txwv, Xelahiya yog Melayau txwv,
Melayau yog Amaliya txwv, Amaliya yog Ahithu txwv,
Ahithu yog Xantau txwv, Xantau yog Ahima‑a txwv,
Ahima‑a yog Axaliya txwv, Axaliya yog Yauhanaa txwv,
Yauhanaa yog Axaliya txwv. Yauhanaa yog tug kws ua pov thawj huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev kws Xalaumoo ua rua huv Yeluxalee.
Axaliya yog Amaliya txwv, Amaliya yog Ahithu txwv,
Ahithu yog Xantau txwv, Xantau yog Salu txwv,
Salu yog Hikhiya txwv, Hikhiya yog Axaliya txwv,
Axaliya yog Xelaya txwv, Xelaya yog Yehauxanta txwv.
Yehauxanta raug kuav moog poob tebchaws rua thaus Yawmsaub muab cov Yuta hab Yeluxalee rua huv Nenpukhanexa txhais teg kuav moog poob tebchaws.
Levi cov tub yog Kawsoo, Khauha hab Melali.
Nuav yog Kawsoo le tub tej npe, yog Lini hab Sime‑i.
Khauha cov tub yog Alaav, Ixaha, Heploo hab Uxi‑ee.
Melali le tub yog Mali hab Musi. Cov nuav yog Levi cov quas cum lawv le puab tej txwv npe.
Ntawm Kawsoo caaj ceg lug moog, Kawsoo tug tub yog Lini, Lini tug tub yog Yahas, Yahas tug tub yog Xima,
Xima tug tub yog Yau‑av, Yau‑av tug tub yog Intau, Intau tug tub yog Xelag, Xelag tug tub yog Ye‑athelai.
Ntawm Khauha caaj ceg lug moog, Khauha tug tub yog Aminanta, Aminanta tug tub yog Khaula, Khaula tug tub yog Axi,
Axi tug tub yog Eekhana, Eekhana tug tub yog Enpiyaxas, Enpiyaxas tug tub yog Axi,
Axi tug tub yog Thaha, Thaha tug tub yog Uli‑ee, Uli‑ee tug tub yog Uxiya, Uxiya tug tub yog Sa‑u.
Eekhana le tub yog Amaxai hab Ahimau.
Ahimau tug tub yog Eekhana, Eekhana tug tub yog Xaufai, Xaufai tug tub yog Nahaj,
Nahaj tug tub yog Elia, Elia tug tub yog Yelauhaa, Yelauhaa tug tub yog Eekhana.
Xamuyee cov tub yog, Yau‑ee kws yog tug tub hlub, tug ob yog Anpiya.
Melali caaj ceg yog le nuav, Melali tub yog Mali, Mali tug tub yog Lini, Lini tug tub yog Sime‑i, Sime‑i tug tub yog Uxa,
Uxa tug tub yog Sime‑a, Sime‑a tug tub yog Hakiya, Hakiya tug tub yog Axaya.
Cov nuav yog cov kws Tavi tsaa ua cov kws saib tej num hu nkauj huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev rua thaus kws lub swb xaab sws cog lug tau nyob rua huv lawm.

Puab le num yog hu nkauj rua ntawm qhov rooj Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb moog txug thaus Xalaumoo ua tau Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev rua huv Yeluxalee tav, hab puab ua puab teg num lawv le kws teem ca.
Cov kws tuaj ua Vaajtswv teg num hab puab cov tub yog le nuav. Ntawm Khauha caaj ceg lug moog yog Hemaa kws yog tug hu nkauj. Hemaa yog Yau‑ee tug tub, Yau‑ee yog Xamuyee tug tub,
Xamuyee yog Eekhana tug tub, Eekhana yog Yelauhaa tug tub, Yelauhaa yog Eli‑ee tug tub, Eli‑ee yog Thau‑a tug tub,
Thau‑a yog Xub tug tub, Xub yog Eekhana tug tub, Eekhana yog Maha tug tub, Maha yog Amaxai tug tub,
Amaxai yog Eekhana tug tub, Eekhana yog Yau‑ee tug tub, Yau‑ee yog Axaliya tug tub, Axaliya yog Xefaniya tug tub,
Xefaniya yog Thaha tug tub, Thaha yog Axi tug tub, Axi yog Enpiyaxas tug tub, Enpiyaxa yog Khaula tug tub,
Khaula yog Ixaha tug tub, Ixaha yog Khauha tug tub, Khauha yog Levi tug tub, Levi yog Yixayee tug tub.
Hab Axas kws yog Hemaa le kwvtij yog tug kws sawv ntawm Hemaa saab teg xws, yog Axas kws yog Npelekhiya tug tub, Npelekhiya yog Sime‑a tug tub,
Sime‑a yog Mikha‑ee tug tub, Mikha‑ee yog Npa‑axeya tug tub, Npa‑axeya yog Makhiya tug tub,
Makhiya yog Ethani tug tub, Ethani yog Xelag tug tub, Xelag yog Antaya tug tub,
Antaya yog Etha tug tub, Etha yog Xima tug tub, Xima yog Sime‑i tug tub,
Sime‑i yog Yahas tug tub, Yahas yog Kawsoo tug tub, Kawsoo yog Levi tug tub.
Ntawm Hemaa saab teg phem mas yog Melali cov tub kws yog puab cov kwvtij, yog Etha kws yog Khisi tug tub, Khisi yog Anti tug tub, Anti yog Malu tug tub,
Malu yog Hasanpiya tug tub, Hasanpiya yog Amaxiya tug tub, Amaxiya yog Hikhiya tug tub,
Hikhiya yog Aaxi tug tub, Aaxi yog Npani tug tub, Npani yog Semaw tug tub,
Semaw yog Mali tug tub, Mali yog Musi tug tub, Musi yog Melali tug tub, Melali yog Levi tug tub.
Cov Levi kws yog puab cov kwvtij raug tsaa ua txhua yaam num huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev.

Aloo hab nwg cov tub yog cov kws muab hov txhua chaw xyeem tso sau lub thaaj kws hlawv huvsw xyeem hab sau lub thaaj moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab ua txhua yaam num huv chaav dawb huv kawg nkaus, hab ua kevcai ntxuav kev txhum rua cov Yixayee, lawv le txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv tug qhev Mauxe tau has kuas puab ua.
Aloo cov tub yog le nuav, Aloo tug tub yog Ele‑axa, Ele‑axa tug tub yog Fineha, Fineha tug tub yog Anpisuva,
Anpisuva tug tub yog Npukhi, Npukhi tug tub yog Uxi, Uxi tug tub yog Xelahiya,
Xelahiya tug tub yog Melayau, Melayau tug tub yog Amaliya, Amaliya tug tub yog Ahithu,
Ahithu tug tub yog Xantau, Xantau tug tub yog Ahima‑a.
Puab tej chaw nyob hab puab tej zej zog hab puab tej nrwm teb yog le nuav. Aloo caaj ceg kws yog Khauha cum tau rhu ntawv thawj daim,
mas puab tau lub moos Heploo huv tebchaws Yuta hab tej tshaav zaub kws nyob puag ncig ntawd,
tassws tej laj teb hab tej zej zog ntawm lub moos hov puab muab rua Yefune tug tub Khalej.

Tej moos cawm sav kws muab rua Aloo cov tub yog le nuav, yog lub moos Heploo, lub moos Lina hab tej tshaav zaub kws nyob puag ncig ntawd, hab lub moos Yathi, lub moos Ethemau‑a hab tej tshaav zaub kws nyob puag ncig ntawd,
lub moos Hilees hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Ntenpi hab tej tshaav zaub,
lub moos Asaa hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Npeseme hab tej tshaav zaub,

hab ntawm xeem Npeeyamee tebchaws muab lub moos Kenpa hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Alame hab tej tshaav zaub hab lub moos Anathau hab tej tshaav zaub. Tej moos nuav kws muab faib rua puab txhua cum nyob huvsw muaj kaum peb lub moos.
Cum Khauha kws tseed tshuav rhu tau ntawv txais kaum lub moos ntawm cov quas cum huv ib nraab xeem Manaxe.
Kawsoo caaj ceg rhu tau kaum peb lub moos ntawm xeem Ixakha, xeem Asaw, xeem Nathali hab xeem Manaxe huv Npasaa tebchaws lawv le puab cov quas cum.
Melali caaj ceg rhu tau kaum ob lub moos ntawm xeem Lunpee xeem Kas hab xeem Xenpuloo lawv le puab cov quas cum.
Ua le nuav cov Yixayee tau muab tej moos hab tej tshaav zaub rua cov Levi.
Puab kuj rhu ntawv pub tej moos huv xeem Yuta xeem Xime‑oo hab xeem Npeeyamee lawv le tej npe kws has taag lawm hab.
Khauha caaj ceg muaj qee cum tau tej moos kws ua puab feem ntawm xeem Efa‑i.
Cov Yixayee muab tej moos cawm sav nuav rua puab, yog lub moos Sekhee hab tej tshaav zaub kws nyob peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws, hab lub moos Kexaw hab tej tshaav zaub,
lub moos Yaume‑aa hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Npe Hauloo hab tej tshaav zaub,
lub moos Aiyaloo hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Kalimoo hab tej tshaav zaub.
Mas ntawm ib nraab xeem Manaxe yog lub moos Anaw hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Npile‑aa hab tej tshaav zaub, yog muab rua Khauha caaj ceg qee cum kws tseed tshuav.
Ntawm ib nraab xeem Manaxe puab muab lub moos Kaulaa huv Npasaa tebchaws hab tej tshaav zaub hab lub moos Athalau hab tej tshaav zaub rua Kawsoo caaj ceg.
Ntawm xeem Ixakha puab muab lub moos Khente hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Ntanpela hab tej tshaav zaub,
lub moos Lamau hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Anee hab tej tshaav zaub.
Ntawm xeem Asaw muab lub moos Masaa hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Antoo hab tej tshaav zaub,
lub moos Huko hab tej tshaav zaub, hab lub moos Lehau hab tej tshaav zaub.
Ntawm xeem Nathali muab lub moos Khente huv Kalilai tebchaws hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Hamoo hab tej tshaav zaub hab lub moos Khiliyatha‑i hab tej tshaav zaub.
Cov Melali kws tseed tshuav tau ntawm xeem Xenpuloo yog lub moos Limaunau hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Thanpau hab tej tshaav zaub,
hab ntawm xeem Lunpee kws yog saab dej Yalatee tim u ntawm lub moos Yelikhau kws yog saab nub tuaj yog lub moos Npexaw kws nyob peg toj sab hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Yaxa hab tej tshaav zaub,
lub moos Khentemau hab tej tshaav zaub, hab lub moos Mefa‑a hab tej tshaav zaub.
Ntawm xeem Kas yog lub moos Lamau huv Kile‑a hab tej tshaav zaub, lub moos Mahana‑i hab tej tshaav zaub,
lub moos Hesanpoo hab tej tshaav zaub hab lub moos Yaxaw hab tej tshaav zaub.
Ixakha cov tub yog Thaula, Pu‑a, Yasu hab Siloo huvsw plaub leeg.

Thaula cov tub yog Uxi, Lefaya, Yeli‑ee, Yamai, Ixaa hab Semu‑ee. Puab ua thawj huv puab tej quas yim huv Thaula cum, puab caaj ceg yog tub rog sab luj sab tuab mas thaus Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav mas puab muaj 22,600 leej.
Uxi le tub yog Ilahiya. Ilahiya cov tub yog Mikha‑ee, Aunpantiya, Yau‑ee hab Isiya, huvsw tswb leeg, puavleej ua cov thawj,
hab puab cov nuav caaj ceg lawv le tej quas yim muaj cov tub rog 36,000 leej tsua qhov puab muaj quaspuj hab mivnyuas coob.
Taag nrho puab cov kwvtij kws yog xeem Ixakha huvsw muaj cov tub rog sab luj sab tuab 87,000 leej lawv le kws sau ca huv puab le keeb kwm.
Npeeyamee cov tub yog Npela, Npekhaw hab Yentiya‑ee, huvsw peb leeg.

Npela cov tub yog, Exanpoo, Uxi, Uxi‑ee, Yelimau hab Ilis, huvsw tswb leeg. Puab ua thawj huv puab cov quas cum, puab yog cov tub rog sab luj sab tuab, mas lawv le kws sau ca rua huv puab le keeb kwm muaj 22,034 leej.
Npekhaw cov tub yog Xemila, Yau‑as, Eliyexaw, Eli‑aunai, Ooli, Yelemau, Anpiya, Anathau hab Aleme, puavleej yog Npekhaw cov tub.
Mas lawv le puab caaj ceg le keeb kwm kws sau ca, cov thawj huv puab cov quas cum kws ua tub rog sab luj sab tuab muaj 20,200 leej.
Yentiya‑ee le tub yog Npihaa. Npihaa cov tub yog Ye‑u, Npeeyamee, Ehuj, Khena‑ana, Xetha, Thasi hab Ahisaha.
Cov nuav puavleej yog Yentiya‑ee cov tub mas suav lawv le puab cov thawj huv cov quas cum kws ua tau tub rog sab luj sab tuab muaj 17,200 leej kws npaaj txhwj yuav moog ua rog.
Supi hab Hupi yog Ilab cov tub, Husi yog Ahaw tug tub.
Nathali cov tub yog Yaxi‑ee, Kuni, Yexaw hab Salu, yog Npiha cov tub ki.
Manaxe tug tub yog Ali‑ee, kws yog nwg tug nam yau tuabneeg Alaa yug. Nwg tseed yug tau Makhi kws yog Kile‑a txwv hab.
Makhi nrhav quaspuj rua Hupi hab Supi. Makhi tug muam hu ua Ma‑akha. Makhi muaj dua ib tug tub hu ua Xelaufeha. Mas Xelaufeha muaj ntxhais xwb.
Ma‑akha kws yog Makhi le quaspuj yug ib tug tub mas muab hu ua Pelev, mas Pelev tug kwv hu ua Sele. Sele cov tub yog Ulaa hab Lakhee.
Ulaa tug tub yog Npentaa. Cov nuav yog Kile‑a cov tub. Kile‑a yog Makhi tug tub, Makhi yog Manaxe tug tub.
Kile‑a tug muam Hamaulekhe yug tau Ihau, Anpiyexaw hab Malag.
Seminta cov tub yog Ahi‑aa, Sekhee, Likhi hab Aniyaa.
Efa‑i cov tub yog Suthela, Suthela tug tub yog Npele, Npele tug tub yog Thaha, Thaha tug tub yog Ele‑anta, Ele‑anta tug tub yog Thaha,
Thaha tug tub yog Xanpa, Xanpa tug tub yog Suthela. Hab Efa‑i muaj Exaw hab Ele‑a, mas cov tuabneeg Ka kws yug huv lub tebchaws hov tau muab tua lawm vem ob tug moog lws puab tej tsaj txhu.
Efa‑i kws yog ob tug txwv tau quaj ntsuag ntau nub, mas nwg cov kwvtij tuaj nplig nwg lub sab.
Mas Efa‑i txhad nrug nwg quaspuj pw nwg txhad xeeb mivnyuas hab yug tau ib tug tub. Efa‑i muab hu ua Npeliya  vem nwg tsev tuabneeg raug kev txom nyem.
Efa‑i tug ntxhais hu ua Se‑ela. Se‑ela yog tug kws ua lub moos Npe Hauloo yog lub peg roob hab lub nraag taj hab lub moos Uxeese‑ela.
Efa‑i tug tub yog Lefa, Lefa tug tub yog Lese, Lese tug tub yog Thelas, Thelas tug tub yog Thahaa,
Thahaa tug tub yog Lantaa, Lantaa tug tub yog Amihu, Amihu tug tub yog Elisama,
Elisama tug tub yog Noo, Noo tug tub yog Yausua.

Thaaj aav hab tej zej zog kws yog puab le yog Npe‑ee hab tej zej zog ib ncig hab lub moos Na‑alaa kws nyob saab nub tuaj hab lub moos Kexaw hab tej zej zog ib ncig kws nyob saab nub poob, lub moos Sekhee hab tej zej zog ib ncig, hab lub moos Aya hab tej zej zog ib ncig,

hab ntawm xeem Manaxe tug nrwm teb yog lub moos Npesaa hab tej zej zog ib ncig, lub moos Tha‑ana hab tej zej zog ib ncig, lub moos Mekintau hab tej zej zog ib ncig, lub moos Ntau hab tej zej zog ib ncig. Yauxej kws yog Yixayee tug tub tej tub ki nyob tej moos hov.
Asaw cov tub yog Ina, Isava, Isavi, Npeliya hab Xelas kws yog puab tug muam.
Npeliya cov tub yog Henpaw hab Makhi‑ee. Makhi‑ee yog Npixa‑i txwv.
Henpaw cov mivnyuas yog Yafeb, Saumaw, Hauthaa hab Sua kws yog puab tug muam.
Yafeb cov tub yog Paxa, Npihaas hab Asava. Cov nuav yog Yafeb cov tub.
Yafeb tug kwv Semaw cov tub yog Lauka, Yehunpa hab Alaa.
Yafeb tug kwv Helee cov tub yog Xaufa, Ina, Sele hab Amaa.
Xaufa cov tub yog Xu‑as, Hanefaw, Su‑aa, Npeli, Ilag,
Npexaw, Hauj, Sama, Sisa, Ithalaa hab Npe‑ela.
Yethaw cov tub yog Yefune, Pixapa hab Ala.
Ula cov tub yog Alag, Hani‑ee hab Lixia.

Cov nuav puavleej yog cov thawj huv cov quas cum xeem Asaw, puab yog tub rog sab luj sab tuab kws txawj tshaaj plawg, yog cov thawj tub rog. Lawv le kws sau ca rua huv puab le ntawv keeb kwm es yuav moog ua tub rog, huvsw muaj 26,000 leej.
Npeeyamee cov tub yog le nuav, Npela yog tug tub hlub, Asanpee yog tug ob, Ahala yog tug peb,
Nauha yog tug plaub, Lafa yog tug tswb.
Npela cov tub yog Antaj, Kela, Anpihuj,
Anpisuva, Na‑amaa, Ahau‑a,
Kela, Sefufaa hab Hulaa.
Cov nuav yog Ehuj cov tub, puab yog cov kws ua thawj huv cov quas cum kws nyob huv lub moos Kenpa es raug kuav moog nyob rua huv lub moos Manaha,
yog Na‑amaa, Ahiya hab Kela kws ua tug thawj coj puab tswv moog. Kela yog Uxa hab Ahihu txwv.
Sahala‑i muaj tub rua huv Mau‑a tebchaws ua qaab kws nwg tub nrauj Husi hab Npa‑alaj kws yog nwg ob tug quaspuj lawm.
Nwg tug quaspuj Haunte yug tau cov tub nuav rua nwg, yog Yaunpam, Xinpi‑a, Mesas, Makhaa,
Ye‑us, Xakhia hab Mima. Cov nuav yog nwg cov tub, yog cov thawj huv puab cov quas cum.
Nwg tug quaspuj Husi kuj yug tau Anpithu hab Eepa‑aa rua nwg.
Eepa‑aa cov tub yog Enpaw, Misa hab Seme. Seme yog tug kws ua lub moos Aunau hab lub moos Lau hab tej zej zog ib ncig,
hab Npeliya hab Sema. Ob tug yog cov thawj huv cov quas cum kws nyob huv lub moos Aiyaloo, hab yog cov kws lawv cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Ka tswv moog lawm.
Hab Ahiyau, Sasa hab Yelemau.
Xenpantiya, Alaj, Entaw,
Mikha‑ee, Isapa hab Yauha yog Npeliya cov tub.
Xenpantiya, Mesulaa, Hikhi, Henpaw,
Isamelai, Iliya hab Yaunpam yog Eepa‑aa cov tub.
Yakhi, Xikhi, Xanti,
Eli‑enai, Xilethai, Eli‑ee,
Antaya, Npelaya hab Sila yog Sime‑i cov tub.
Isapaa, Enpaw, Eli‑ee,
Antoo, Xikhi, Hanaa,
Hananiya, Elaa, Aathauthiya,
Inteya hab Penu‑ee yog Sasa cov tub.
Saaselai, Sehaliya, Athaliya,
Ya‑alesiya, Eliya hab Xikhi yog Yelauhaa cov tub.
Cov nuav ua cov thawj huv cov quas cum lawv le puab caaj ceg le keeb kwm, yog cov kws ua hlub. Cov nuav nyob huv Yeluxalee.
Ye‑i‑ee kws yog Kinpe‑oo txwv nyob huv lub moos Kinpe‑oo. Nwg quaspuj hu ua Ma‑akha.
Nwg tug tub hlub hu ua Antoo, hab muaj Xuv, Khij, Npa‑aa, Nanta,
Kentau, Ahiyau, Xekhaw,
hab Milauj kws yog Sime‑a txwv. Cov nuav nyob npuas puab cov kwvtij hab nrug puab nyob ua ke huv Yeluxalee.
Naw yog Khij txwv, Khij yog Xa‑u txwv, Xa‑u yog Yaunathaa, Makhisuva, Anpinanta hab Esanpa‑aa  txwv.
Yaunathaa tug tub yog Melinpa‑aa, Melinpa‑aa  yog Mikha txwv.
Mikha cov tub yog Pithau, Mele, Thale‑a hab Aha.
Aha yog Yehau‑anta txwv, Yehau‑anta yog Aleme hab Amave hab Xili txwv. Xili yog Mauxa txwv.
Mauxa yog Npine‑a txwv, Npine‑a tug tub yog Lafa, Lafa tug tub yog Ele‑axas, Ele‑axas tug tub yog Axee.
Axee muaj rau tug tub, nuav yog nwg cov tub le npe, yog Alikhaa, Npaukhelu, Yisama‑ee, Se‑aliya, Aunpantiya hab Hanaa. Cov nuav puavleej yog Axee cov tub.
Axee tug kwv Ese cov tub yog Ulaa kws yog nwg tug tub hlub, Ye‑u yog tug ob, Elifele yog tug peb.
Ulaa cov tub yog cov tub rog tua neev nti sab luj sab tuab, muaj tub ki coob ib puas tswb caug leej. Cov nuav puavleej yog xeem Npeeyamee.

Ua le hov ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg sau npe ca lawv le puab caaj ceg le keeb kwm hab cov npe nuav tau muab sau rua huv Yixayee tej vaajntxwv phoo ntawv keeb kwm lawm. Mas Yuta raug kuav coj moog nyob rua huv tebchaws Npanpiloo vem puab lub sab tsw xwb rua Vaajtswv lawm.
Thawj paab kws rov qaab lug nyob huv puab tej vaaj tse kws yog puab tug huv puab tej moos yog cov pov thawj, cov Levi hab cov qhev ua num huv lub tuam tsev.
Muaj qee leej huv xeem Yuta xeem Npeeyamee xeem Efa‑i hab xeem Manaxe nyob huv Yeluxalee,
yog Uthai kws yog Amihu tug tub, Amihu yog Ooli tug tub, Ooli yog Ili tug tub, Ili yog Npani tug tub, Npani yog Yuta tug tub Peles le ib ceg xeeb ntxwv.
Ntawm cum Silau yog Axaya kws yog tub hlub hab nwg cov tub.
Ntawm Xelag caaj ceg yog Ye‑u‑ee hab nwg cov kwvtij, muaj rau pua cuaj caug leej.
Ntawm xeem Npeeyamee yog Mesulaa tug tub Xalu, Mesulaa yog Hauntaviya tug tub, Hauntaviya yog Haxenu‑a tug tub,
hab Yelauhaa tug tub Ineya, hab Uxi tug tub Ela kws yog Mikhi tug xeeb ntxwv, hab Sefathiya tug tub Mesulaa, Sefathiya yog Le‑u‑ee tug tub, Le‑u‑ee yog Iniya tug tub,
hab puab cov kwvtij lawv le puab caaj ceg le keeb kwm kws sau ca, muaj cuaj pua tswb caug rau leej. Cov nuav suavdawg yog cov kws ua thawj huv cov quas cum lawv le puab tej cum.
Huv cov pov thawj yog Yentaya, Yehauyali, Yakhi,
hab Axaliya kws yog Hikhiya tug tub, Hikhiya yog Mesulaa tug tub, Mesulaa yog Xantau tug tub, Xantau yog Melayau tug tub, Melayau yog Ahithu tug tub kws yog tug thawj kws saib Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev.

Hab Antaya kws yog Yelauhaa tug tub, Yelauhaa yog Pasaw tug tub, Pasaw yog Makhiya tug tub, hab Ma‑axai kws yog Anti‑ee tug tub, Anti‑ee yog Yaxela tug tub, Yaxela yog Mesulaa tug tub, Mesulaa yog Mesilemi tug tub, Mesilemi yog Imaw tug tub,
hab puab cov kwvtij kws ua thawj huv puab cov quas cum, huvsw muaj ib txheeb xyaa pua rau caum leej, yog cov kws txawj txawj ua num huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev.
Huv cov Levi muaj Semaya kws yog Hasus tug tub, Hasus yog Alikhaa tug tub, Alikhaa yog Hasanpiya tug tub, kws yog Melali caaj ceg.
Hab Npanpakha, Helev, Kalaa hab Mathaniya kws yog Mikha tug tub. Mikha yog Xikhi tug tub, Xikhi yog Axas tug tub.
Hab Aunpantiya kws yog Semaya tug tub. Semaya yog Kalaa tug tub, Kalaa yog Yentuthu tug tub, hab Npelekhiya kws yog Axa tug tub. Axa yog Eekhana tug tub kws nyob huv cov Nethaufa tej zog.
Cov kws zuv tej rooj loog yog Salu, Akhu, Thaamoo, Ahimaa hab puab cov kwvtij, Salu ua tug thawj.
Lug txug naj nub nwgnuav puab nyob ntawm lub Rooj Loog Vaajntxwv saab nub tuaj. Cov nuav yog cov Levi kws zuv tej rooj loog.

Salu yog Khaule tug tub, Khaule yog Enpiyaxas tug tub, Enpiyaxas yog Khaula tug tub, hab nwg cov kwvtij kws yog Khaula caaj ceg yog cov kws saib daag num hab yog cov kws zuv lub qhov rooj tuam tsev ib yaam le puab tej laug tau saib hab zuv Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub lub qhov rooj.
Ele‑axa tug tub Fineha yog tug kws kaav puab yaav thau u, Yawmsaub nrug nraim nwg nyob.
Meselemiya tug tub Xekhaliya yog tug kws zuv lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb.

Cov kws raug xaiv ua cov kws zuv tej rooj loog muaj ob puas kaum ob leeg. Puab nce npe lawv le puab caaj ceg le keeb kwm hab lawv le tej zog kws puab nyob. Tavi hab Xamuyee kws yog xwbfwb has pum tom hauv ntej tau tsaa puab ua teg num tseem ceeb nuav.
Yog le hov puab hab puab cov tub ki ua cov kws saib hab zuv tej rooj loog ntawm Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev kws yog lub tsev ntaub.
Cov kws zuv tej rooj loog nyob rua plaub faab, yog nyob saab nub tuaj saab nub poob saab peg hab saab nraag.
Hab tej lub swjhawm puab cov kwvtij kws nyob huv puab tej zej zog yuav tsum tuaj nrug puab nyob xyaa nub paab ua num.
Plaub leeg kws ua thawj zuv tej rooj loog kws yog cov Levi hov yog cov kws saib tej chaav tsev hab tej txhaab nyaj huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev.
Puab muaj chaw su puag ncig Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev, tsua qhov puab tej num yog zuv hab puab yuav tsum qheb txhua taagkig.
Muaj qee leej yog cov kws saib hab tu tej cuab yeej kws swv ua Vaajtswv teg num, tsua qhov puab yuav tsum suav txhua zag kws rhu moog hab coj rov lug ca.

Hab muaj qee leej raug tsaa ua cov kws saib txhua yaam kws nyob huv hab saib tej cuab yeej kws dawb huv huvsw hab saib tej moov mog zoo zoo hab tej cawv txwv maab hab tej roj hab tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab tej txum lom.
Hab qee leej kws yog cov pov thawj le tub mas puab tov tej txum lom.
Mathithiya kws yog ib tug Levi, yog Salu tug tub hlub, yog Khaula caaj ceg, nwg le num yog saib cov kws ua tej ncuav plab plab.
Hab puab cov kwvtij qee leej kws yog Khauha caaj ceg ua cov kws saib tej ncuav kws xyeem txawb rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, hab puab yuav tsum npaaj ua txhua nub Xanpatau.
Nuav yog cov hu nkauj kws yog cov thawj huv xeem Levi cov quas cum. Puab nyob huv tej chaav huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev hab tsw ua lwm yaam num tsua qhov puab le num yog nyob tog nruab nub mo ntuj.
Cov nuav yog cov thawj huv xeem Levi cov quas cum, lawv le puab caaj ceg le keeb kwm kws sau ca, puab yog cov thawj coj kws nyob huv Yeluxalee.
Ye‑i‑ee kws yog Kinpe‑oo txwv nyob huv lub moos Kinpe‑oo, nwg quaspuj hu ua Ma‑akha.
Nwg tug tub hlub hu ua Antoo, hab muaj Xuv, Khij, Npa‑aa, Naw, Nanta,
Kentau, Ahiyau, Xekhaliya hab Milauj.
Milauj yog Sime‑aa txwv. Cov nuav nyob npuas puab cov kwvtij hab nrug puab nyob ua ke huv Yeluxalee.
Naw yog Khij txwv, Khij yog Xa‑u txwv. Xa‑u yog Yaunathaa, Makhisuva, Anpinanta hab Esanpa‑aa txwv.
Yaunathaa tug tub yog Melinpa‑aa, Melinpa‑aa yog Mikha txwv.
Mikha cov tub yog Pithau, Mele, Thale‑a hab Aha.
Aha yog Yala txwv, Yala yog Aleme hab Amave hab Xili txwv. Xili yog Mauxa txwv.
Mauxa yog Npine‑a txwv, Npine‑a tug tub yog Lefaya. Lefaya tug tub yog Ele‑axas, Ele‑axas tug tub yog Axee.
Axee muaj rau tug tub. Nuav yog nwg cov tub le npe, yog Axikhaa, Npaukhelu, Yisama‑ee, Se‑aliya, Aunpantiya hab Hanaa. Cov nuav puavleej yog Axee cov tub.
Cov Filixatee tuaj ua rog rua cov Yixayee, mas cov Yixayee tswv cov Filixatee hab raug tua tuag rua sau lub roob Kinpau‑a.
Cov Filixatee lawv cuag Xa‑u hab nwg cov tub, mas cov Filixatee tua Yaunathaa hab Anpinanta hab Makhisuva kws yog Xa‑u le tub tuag taag.
Ua rog nyaav heev tuaj ti Xa‑u, cov tub rog tua neev ntswb Xa‑u, txawm tua raug nwg mob heev.

Tes Xa‑u txawm has rua tug kws nqaa nwg tej cuab yeej tas, “Ca le rhu ntaaj lug nkaug kuv kuas tshaab plawg, ntshai tsaam cov kws tsw ua kevcai txav nuav tuaj ua limham saib tsw taug kuv.” Tassws tug kws nqaa tej cuab yeej tsw kaam nkaug vem yog ntshai heev. Tes Xa‑u txawm rhu hlo nwg raab ntaaj lug cuab es nwg khwb nkaus chob hlo raab ntaaj hov.
Thaus tug kws nqaa tej cuab yeej pum tas Xa‑u tuag lawm, nwg kuj cuab nwg raab ntaaj khwb nkaus chob nwg tuag hab.
Yog le hov Xa‑u txhad tuag hab nwg peb tug tub hab nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg tuag huvsw ua ke.

Thaus cov Yixayee suavdawg kws nyob huv lub haav pum tas cov tub rog tswv lawm hab Xa‑u hab Xa‑u cov tub tuag taag lawm, puab txawm tso puab tej moos tseg tswv taag, mas cov Filixatee lug nyob rua huv.
Nub tom qaab thaus cov Filixatee tuaj moog khaws cov kws raug tua tuag tej cuab yeej moog yuav, puab pum Xa‑u hab Xa‑u cov tub tuag rua sau lub roob Kinpau‑a.

Puab kuj hle nwg tej cuab yeej hab coj nwg lub taubhau hab nwg tej cuab yeej ua rog moog, hab puab tso tuabneeg xaa xuv moog thoob Filixatee tebchaws coj xuv zoo moog pav rua puab tej txoov daab hab pav rua cov pejxeem.
Puab muab Xa‑u tej cuab yeej ua rog khaws ca rua huv lub tsev kws teev puab tej daab, hab muab nwg taubhau dai rua huv lub tsev teev daab Ntakoo.
Thaus cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Yanpe Kile‑a suavdawg nov txhua yaam kws cov Filixatee ua rua Xa‑u lub cev tuag,

cov txwvneej kws sab luj sab tuab suavdawg txawm sawv tseeg moog ib mos kaaj ntug hab coj Xa‑u hab Xa‑u cov tub lub cev tuag lug rua ntawm lub moos Yanpe. Puab coj cov pob txhaa moog log rua huv qaab tsob ntoo qheb huv lub moos Yanpe hab yoo mov tau xyaa nub.
Xa‑u txhad tuag vem yog nwg lub sab tsw xwb rua Vaajtswv. Nwg ua tsw ncaaj rua Yawmsaub, tsua qhov nwg tsw tuav rawv Yawmsaub tej lug nkaw, hab nwg moog has tug txwv neeb txwv yaig paab saib yaig,
hab nwg tsw moog nug Yawmsaub saib yuav ua le caag. Yog le ntawd Yawmsaub txhad muab nwg tua hab muab hlo lub tebchaws rua Yexi tug tub Tavi kaav.
Ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tuaj txoos ua ke tuaj cuag Tavi huv lub moos Heploo hab has tas, “Peb nrug koj koom nqaj koom txhaa.

Thau u txawm yog Xa‑u ua vaajntxwv kaav los koj kuj yog tug kws coj cov Yixayee tawm moog hab coj rov qaab lug, hab Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv has rua koj tas, ‘Koj yuav ua tug yug yaaj kaav kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee hab koj yuav ua kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee tug thawj.’ ”

Yog le hov Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug suavdawg txhad tuaj cuag vaajntxwv rua huv lub moos Heploo, hab Tavi nrug puab sws cog lug huv lub moos Heploo rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, tes puab txawm laub roj tsaa Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixayee lawv le tej lug kws Yawmsaub kuas Xamuyee has.
Tavi hab ib tsoom Yixayee huvsw moog rua Yeluxalee kws yog lub moos Yenpu. Cov Yenpu kws yog cov qub tuabneeg huv tebchaws hov nyob hov ntawd.
Cov tuabneeg huv Yenpu has rua Tavi tas, “Koj yuav txeem tsw tau lug rua huv lub moos nuav.” Txawm le ntawd los Tavi txeeb tau lub chaw ruaj khov Xi‑oo, kws yog Tavi lub nroog.

Tavi has tas, “Leejtwg xub ntaus cov tuabneeg Yenpu ua ntej tug ntawd yuav tau ua tug hlub hab ua tug thawj kaav cov tub rog.” Tes Xeluya  tug tub Yau‑a txhad xub moog ntaus ua ntej mas nwg txhad tau ua tug hlub.
Tavi nyob hlo huv lub chaw ruaj khov hov, mas txhad hu ua Tavi lub nroog.
Hab Tavi tswm lub nroog puag ncig txwj ntawm lub loog Milau. Hab Yau‑a kuj khu lwm qhov kws tseed tshuav huv lub nroog hov.
Tavi muaj fwjchim zuj zug vem yog Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nrug nraim nwg.
Nuav yog Tavi cov tuam leem kws ua hlub, yog cov kws nrug ib tsoom Yixayee huvsw paab kuas nwg kaav tau tebchaws, hab tsaa tau nwg ua vaajntxwv lawv le Yawmsaub tej lug kws has txug Yixayee.

Txwj nuav moog yog has txug Tavi cov tuam leem. Yasaunpe‑aa kws yog cum Hamauni yog tug thawj  huv paab peb tug tuam leem. Nwg xuas muv moog ua ib zag rog rua peb puas leej mas muab puab tua taag huvsw.
Peb tug tuam leem hov tug ob yog Ntauntau tug tub Ele‑axa kws yog cum Ahau‑a.
Nwg nrug Tavi nyob ntawm lub moos Pantami rua thaus cov Filixatee sau zog tuaj ua rog hov ntawd. Muaj ib thaaj teb qeb mas cov Yixayee tswv cov Filixatee.
Tassws nwg sawv khov kho huv plawv thaaj teb hov zuv rawv thaaj teb hov hab tua cov Filixatee. Mas Yawmsaub tau paab puab kov yeej hlo.
Muaj peb leeg huv paab peb caug tug thawj tub rog nqeg moog cuag Tavi ntawm daim txhwb zeb huv lub qhov tsua Antulaa rua thaus Filixatee cov tub rog ua yeej huv lub haav Lefa‑i.
Thaus hov Tavi nyob huv lub chaw ruaj khov hab cov Filixatee ib paab tub rog kuj nyob zuv rawv huv lub moos Npelehee.
Mas Tavi txawm has seev yeeg tas, “Kheev muaj ib tug moog nqaa tau cov dej huv lub qhov dej kws nyob ntawm ib saab rooj loog Npelehee lug rua kuv haus.”

Mas peb tug tuam leem hov txhad txeem plawg huv cov Filixatee lub yeej moog ntaus tau dej huv lub qhov dej ntawm Npelehee ib saab rooj loog coj lug pub rua Tavi. Tassws Tavi tsw kaam haus cov dej hov, nwg muab laub xyeem rua Yawmsaub,

hab has tas, “Kuv twv kuv tug Vaajtswv tas kuv yeej tsw xaav kuas puab ua le hov. Kuv yuav haus cov tuabneeg nuav cov ntshaav lov? Tsua qhov puab sev nyog txujsa moog coj cov dej nuav lug.” Ua le nuav nwg txhad tsw kaam haus. Tej nuav yog tej kws peb tug tuam leem hov ua.
Yau‑a tug kwv Anpisai ua peb caug leej hov  tug thawj. Nwg xuas muv ua rog rua peb puas leej mas muab puab tua taag huvsw mas txhad tau koob meej ib yaam le peb leeg hov.
Nwg yog tug muaj koob meej ntau dua peb caug leej hov.  Nwg ua tug thawj kaav peb caug leej tassws tsw suav nwg rua huv peb leeg hov.

Yehauyanta tug tub Npenaya yog ib tug sab luj sab tuab huv lub moos Khaxe‑ee, nwg ua tej qhov num luj. Nwg tau tua Mau‑a cov tub rog ob tug kws muaj zug kawg le. Hab nwg tau nqeg rua huv lub qhov mas tua tau ib tug tsuv ntxhuav rua nub kws lug daus xwb daus npu.

Hab nwg tau tua ib tug tuabneeg Iyi kws lub cev luj hab sab tswb tshwm. Tug Iyi hov tuav rawv raab muv luj le raab nqog, kuas Npenaya coj tug paas nreg moog rua ntawm tug Iyi xwb, tes txeeb tau tug Iyi raab muv ntawm nwg teg lug hab muab nwg raab muv rov nkaug tug Iyi tuag.
Yehauyanta tug tub Npenaya tau ua tej num nuav hab tau koob meej ib yaam nkaus le peb tug tuam leem hov.
Nwg muaj koob meej huv peb caug leej hov tassws tsw suav nwg tsua huv peb tug tuam leem hov. Tavi kuj tsaa nwg ua tug thawj kaav paab tub rog kws zuv vaajntxwv.
Cov tuamleem huv paab tub rog yog le nuav, yog Yau‑a tug kwv Axahee, Ntauntau tug tub Eehanaa kws nyob huv Npelehee,
Samau huv lub moos Halau, Helexi huv lub moos Pelau,
Ikhe tug tub Ila huv moos Thekhau‑a, Anpiyexaw huv moos Anathau,
Xinpekhai kws yog Husa cum, Ilai huv cum Ahau‑a,
Mahalai huv moos Nethaufa, Npa‑anas tug tub Heles huv moos Nethaufa,
Linpai tug tub Ithai huv moos Kinpe‑a huv Npeeyamee tebchaws, Npenaya huv moos Pilathoo,
Hulai kws nyob ntawm tug dej Ka‑a, Anpi‑ee huv cum Anpa,
Amave huv moos Npahuli, Eliyanpa huv moos Sa‑aanpoo,
Hasee huv cum Kixau, Saki tug tub Yaunathaa huv moos Hala,
Xakha tug tub Ahiyaa huv moos Hala, Aw tug tub Elifaa,
Hefaw huv moos Mekhela, Ahiya huv moos Pelau,
Helau huv moos Khamee, Exanpai tug tub Na‑alai,
Nathaa tug kwv Yau‑ee, Haki tug tub Miha,
Xeleb kws yog tuabneeg Aamoo, Nahalai huv moos Npe‑awlau kws kwv Xeluya tug tub Yau‑a tej cuab yeej ua rog,
Ila kws yog Ithala cum, Kale huv cum Ithala,
Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai, Alai tug tub Xanpa,
Sixa tug tub Antina kws yog xeem Lunpee, yog ib tug thawj huv xeem Lunpee hab muaj peb caug leej nrug nwg,
Ma‑akha tug tub Hanaa, Yausafa huv cum Mine,
Uxi‑a huv moos Athalau, Hauthaa ob tug tub Sama hab Ye‑i‑ee huv moos Alau‑aw,
Sili tug tub Yentiya‑ee, hab nwg tug kwv Yauha huv moos Thixai,
Eli‑ee huv cum Mahavai, hab Eena‑aa ob tug tub Yelinpai hab Yausaviya, hab Ima kws yog tuabneeg Mau‑a,
Eli‑ee hab Aunpe, hab Ya‑axi‑ee huv cum Mexaunpai.
Nuav yog cov txwvneej kws tuaj cuag Tavi ntawm Xilaj rua thaus nwg moog hovtwg tsw tshua tau tsua qhov nwg tswv Xa‑u kws yog Khij tug tub. Puab yog cov sab luj sab tuab kws paab Tavi ua rog.
Puab yog cov kws txawj tua neev nti, puab tua tau neev nti hab fav ntaus qai zeb ob saab teg huvsw. Puab yog xeem Npeeyamee, yog Xa‑u le kwvtij.
Tug thawj yog Ahiyexaw, tug ob yog Yau‑as, mas ob tug yog Sema‑a huv moos Kinpe‑a le tub, hab Amave ob tug tub kws yog Yexi‑ee hab Peleb. Hab Npelakha hab Yehu huv moos Anathau,
Isamaya huv moos Kinpe‑oo, yog ib tug sab luj sab tuab huv peb caug tug tuam leem hab yog ib tug thawj kws kaav peb caug leej hov. Hab Yelemi, Yahaxi‑ee, Yauhanaa, Yauxanpa huv moos Kentela,
Eluxai, Yelimau, Npe‑aliya, Semaliya, Sefathiya huv cum Halub,
Eekhana, Isiya, Axalee, Yau‑exaw hab Yasaunpe‑aa kws yog cum Khaula.
Hab Yelauhaa huv moos Kentau ob tug tub kws yog Yau‑ela hab Xenpantiya.

Muaj cov tub rog huv xeem Kas tswv moog cuag Tavi rua ntawm lub chaw ruaj khov huv tebchaws moj saab qhua. Puab yog cov kws sab luj sab tuab kws txawj ua rog, puab txawj swv daim phaj hlau thaiv hauv sab hab swv muv. Puab ntsej muag nyaum zoo le tsuv ntxhuav hab puab dha nrawm le kauv seb sau roob.
Exaw yog tug thawj, tug ob yog Aunpantiya, tug peb yog Elia,
tug plaub yog Misamana, tug tswb yog Yelemi,
tug rau yog Athai, tug xyaa yog Eli‑ee,
tug yim yog Yauhanaa, tug cuaj yog Eexanpa,
tug kaum yog Yelemi, tug kaum ib yog Manpanai.
Cov tuabneeg Kas nuav ua cov thawj kaav cov tub rog, tug yau muaj zug cuag le ib puas leej tub rog, tug luj muaj zug cuag le ib txheeb leej.

Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws hlaa tug nam dej Yalatee rua thaus lub ib hlis, thaus kws dej nyaab ob saab ntug huvsw, hab ua rua cov kws nyob ntawm tej ntug haav saab nub tuaj hab saab nub poob tawg tswv taag huvsw.
Muaj cov txwvneej qee leej huv xeem Npeeyamee hab xeem Yuta tuaj cuag Tavi ntawm lub chaw ruaj khov.

Tavi txawm tawm moog tog txais puab hab has rua puab tas, “Yog mej tuaj ntaus phoojywg rua kuv es yuav paab kuv, kuv yuav nrug mej koom ua ib lub sab. Tassws yog mej tuaj es txawm yog kuv txhais teg tsw ua txhum daabtsw los mej yuav muab kuv muag rua kuv cov yeeb ncuab, tes thov peb tej laug tug Vaajtswv saib hab txav txem rua mej.”

Vaajtswv tug Ntsuj Plig txawm lug kaav Amaxai kws yog tug thawj huv peb caug tug tuam leem lub sab mas nwg has tas, “Tavi 'e, peb puavleej yog koj le, Yexi tug tub 'e, peb tuaj koj tog. Thov kuas koj noj qaab nyob zoo, hab cov kws paab koj noj qaab nyob zoo. Tsua qhov koj tug Vaajtswv yog tug paab koj.” Mas Tavi txhad txais yuav puab hab tsaa puab ua cov thawj kaav nwg cov tub rog.

Muaj qee leej huv xeem Manaxe kuj tau tswv moog tuaj Tavi tog rua lub swjhawm kws Tavi moog nrug cov Filixatee ua rog rua Xa‑u. Tassws Tavi tsw paab cov Filixatee tsua qhov Filixatee cov thawj tau sablaaj hab xaa Tavi rov qaab. Puab has tas, “Tsaam tes nwg yuav tswv moog tuaj Xa‑u kws yog nwg tug tswv tog mas peb yuav tuag tag tag le.”

Thaus kws nwg moog rua lub moos Xilaj mas cov txwvneej huv xeem Manaxe nuav tswv tuaj ua nwg tog, yog Anas, Yauxanpa, Yentiya‑ee, Mikha‑ee, Yauxanpa, Elihu hab Xilethai, yog cov thawj kaav ib txheeb leej tub rog huv xeem Manaxe.
Puab paab Tavi ntaus cov tuabneeg kws tuaj lws tebchaws, tsua qhov puab suavdawg yog tub rog kws sab luj sab tuab hab ua cov thawj kaav paab tub rog.
Txhua txhua nub muaj txwvneej tswv lug tuaj Tavi tog yuav paab nwg, mas nwg paab tub rog txhad le coob heev yaam nkaus le Vaajtswv paab tub rog.
Nuav moog yog tej paab tub rog kws coj cuab yeej ua rog kws tswv lug cuag Tavi rua ntawm lub moos Heploo es yuav muab lub tebchaws kws Xa‑u kaav rua Tavi, lawv le tej lug kws Yawmsaub has tseg.
Xeem Yuta cov kws tuav phaj hlau hab muv muaj 6,800 leej tub rog kws coj cuab yeej ua rog.
Xeem Xime‑oo cov kws sab luj sab tuab ua rog muaj 7,100 leej.
Xeem Levi muaj 4,600 leej,
hab Yehauyanta kws ua thawj coj huv Aloo cum muaj tuabneeg nrug nwg 3,700 leej,
hab Xantau kws yog ib tug tub hluas sab luj sab tuab hab neeg nkaum ob tug thawj tub rog huv nwg cum.
Xeem Npeeyamee kws yog Xa‑u le kwvtij muaj 3,000 leej. Yaav dhau lug cov nuav feem coob tau zwm rua Xa‑u caaj ceg.
Xeem Efa‑i muaj 20,800 leej kws sab luj sab tuab, yog cov kws muaj suab muaj npe huv puab cov quas cum.
Ib nraab xeem Manaxe muaj 18,000 leej, yog cov kws raug xaiv npe kuas moog tsaa Tavi ua vaajntxwv.
Xeem Ixakha muaj cov kws taab faab daav paub caij paub nyoog paub tas Yixayee tswm nyog ua daabtsw, muaj cov ua thawj 200 leej hab tej kwvtij huvsw kws puab kaav.
Xeem Xenpuloo muaj 50,000 leej tub rog kws txeev ua rog dua lawd nqaa txhua yaam cuab yeej ua rog txhwj zog ua rog, mas puab ua ib lub sab yuav paab Tavi.
Xeem Nathali muaj cov kws ua thawj kaav tub rog 1,000 leej hab muaj 37,000 leej tub rog kws coj daim phaj hlau hab muv.
Xeem Ntaaj muaj 28,600 leej tub rog kws npaaj txhwj zog ua rog.
Xeem Asaw muaj 40,000 leej tub rog kws txeev ua rog dua hab npaaj txhwj zog ua rog.
Xeem Lunpee hab xeem Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe kws nyob saab tug dej Yalatee nub tuaj muaj 120,000 leej tub rog muaj txhua yaam cuab yeej ua rog.

Cov tub rog nuav huvsw npaaj txhwj ua rog tau tuaj rua ntawm Heploo, ua tuab lub sab xaav tseg tas yuav tsaa Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav Yixayee huvsw. Cov pejxeem Yixayee kws tseed tshuav suavdawg kuj ua tuab lub sab yuav tsaa Tavi ua vaajntxwv ib yaam nkaus hab.
Puab nrug Tavi noj hab haus hov ntawd tau peb nub, tsua qhov puab cov kwvtij tau npaaj tseg rua puab.

Cov kwvtij zej zog kws nyob deb txug tebchaws Ixakha tebchaws Xenpuloo hab tebchaws Nathali tau npaaj zaub mov rua neeg, luav, ntxhuav, luj txwv hab nyuj thauj ntau kawg le tuaj. Muaj moov mog ntxhwb, ncuav txwv cua, tej tauv txwv maab qhuav hab cawv txwv maab, hab roj hab nyuj hab yaaj, tsua qhov muaj kev zoo sab xyiv faab huv Yixayee tebchaws.
Tavi nrug cov kws kaav ib txheeb hab cov kws kaav ib puas hab cov thawj txhua tug sablaaj,

mas Tavi has rua ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee tas, “Yog mej suavdawg pum zoo hab yog lawv le Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub sab nyam, kuas peb xaa xuv moog thoob plhawv rua peb cov kwvtij kws tseed tshuav huv tebchaws Yixayee huvsw hab xaa rua cov pov thawj hab cov Levi kws nyob huv tej moos kws muaj tshaav zaub kuas puab tuaj txoos ua ke cuag peb ntawm nuav.
Mas peb ca le coj peb tug Vaajtswv lub swb xaab rov qaab lug rua peb, tsua qhov thaus Xa‑u ua vaajntxwv mas peb tsw quav ntsej lawm.”
Ib tsoom pejxeem suavdawg kuj has hum le hov, tsua qhov yaam hov cov pejxeem suavdawg pum zoo.

Yog le ntawd Tavi txhad hu cov pejxeem Yixayee huvsw kws nyob txwj nrho ntawm tug dej Sihau huv Iyi tebchaws moog txug ntawm txujkev kws moog rua lub moos Hama tuaj txoos ua ke es yuav moog coj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab ntawm lub moos Khile‑a Ye‑ali lug.

Tavi hab ib tsoom Yixayee huvsw moog rua ntawm lub moos Npa‑ala kws yog lub moos Khile‑a Ye‑ali huv Yuta tebchaws es yuav coj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab kws hu lawv le Yawmsaub lub npe kws nyob lub zwm txwv sau cov Khelunpee  lug.
Puab kuj muab ib lub tsheb nyuj tshab thauj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab ntawm Anpinanta lub tsev moog, mas Uxa hab Ahiyau tsaav lub tsheb ntawd.

Tavi hab cov Yixayee suavdawg kuj zoo sab xyiv faab rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag kawg puab tug daag tug zug, hab hu nkauj ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv nkauj nog ncaas luj, ntaus nruag hab npuaj nruag tooj lab hab tshuab raaj kub yaaj.
Thaus puab lug txug ntawm Khintoo lub tshaav ntaus qoob Uxa cev teg tuav nkaus lub swb xaab tsua qhov nyuj dawm.
Mas Yawmsaub txhad npau tawg rua Uxa hab ntaus Uxa tuag vem yog nwg cev teg tuav lub swb xaab, tes nwg txawm tuag rua ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag.
Tavi chim tsua qhov Yawmsaub txujkev npau tawg tshwm plawg lug rua Uxa, vem le ntawd txhad hu lub chaw hov hu ua Pele‑uxa  lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Nub ntawd Tavi kuj ntshai Vaajtswv heev hab nwg has tas, “Kuv yuav ua le caag coj tau Vaajtswv lub swb xaab rov moog rua kuv?”
Tavi txawm tsw coj lub swb xaab rov moog rua huv Tavi lub nroog, tassws nwg coj moog ca rua tom Aunpe Entoo kws yog tuabneeg Ka lub tsev.
Vaajtswv lub swb xaab nyob huv Aunpe Entoo lub tsev tau peb lub hlis, mas Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua Aunpe Entoo tsev tuabneeg hab txhua yaam kws nwg muaj.
Vaajntxwv Hilaa huv lub nroog Thailab tso tuabneeg xaa xuv tuaj cuag Tavi hab xaa ntoo cab hab cov Kws txhwm pob zeb hab cov Kws ntoo tuaj ua lub tsev rua Tavi nyob.
Tavi paub tas Yawmsaub tau tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv ruaj khov kaav cov Yixayee hab ua rua nwg lub tebchaws vaam meej vem yog saib rua nwg haiv tuabneeg Yixayee.
Tavi yuav dua nam yau hab coj tej hluas nkauj lug kaav rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalee, hab yug dua tub hab ntxhais.
Cov mivnyuas kws Tavi yug huv Yeluxalee le npe yog le nuav, yog Samu‑a, Saunpam, Nathaa, Xalaumoo,
Iha, Elisu‑a, Eepele,
Nauka, Nefe, Yafia,
Elisama, Npe‑eeyanta hab Elifele.
Thaus cov Filixatee nov tas Tavi raug tsaa ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixayee huvsw, cov Filixatee suavdawg txawm nce tuaj nrhav Tavi. Tavi nov le hov nwg txawm tawm moog tiv puab.
Cov Filixatee tau tuaj lws huv lub haav Lefa‑i.

Tavi txawm ua nug rua Vaajtswv tas, “Kuv yuav moog ntaus cov Filixatee lov? Koj yuav muab puab rua huv kuv txhais teg los tsw muab?” Yawmsaub teb Tavi tas, “Ca le moog, kuv yeej yuav muab puab rua huv koj txhais teg.”

Tavi txhad moog rua ntawm lub moos Npa‑aa Pelaxi mas Tavi kov yeej puab hov ntawd, hab Tavi has tas, “Vaajtswv swv kuv txhais teg txeem plawg rua kuv cov yeeb ncuab yaam le dej txeem plawg moog nyaab.” Vem le hov lub chaw hov txhad hu ua Npa‑aa Pelaxi.
Puab txhad muab puab tej txoov daab tso tseg rua hov ntawd mas Tavi has kuas muab tej txoov daab hov hlawv huvsw.
Cov Filixatee rov qaab tuaj dua lws huv lub haav hov hab.
Thaus Tavi rov qaab ua nug rua Vaajtswv dua ib zag Vaajtswv has rua nwg tas, “Koj tsw xob ncaaj moog, ca le zos moog ntaus puab ncaaj ntawm cov ntoo zaub kaab.
Thaus koj nov suab nrov sau cov ntsws ntoo zaub kaab yaam le suab kws tub rog moog kev, koj ca le tawm moog ua rog, vem Vaajtswv tau ua koj ntej tawm moog ntaus Filixatee cov tub rog lawm.”
Tavi ua lawv le Vaajtswv has rua nwg, mas ntaus cov Filixatee txwj ntawm lub moos Kinpe‑oo moog txug ncua lub moos Kexaw.
Tavi lub moo nrov nchaa moog thoob txhua lub tebchaws, hab Yawmsaub ua rua txhua haiv tuabneeg ntshai Tavi.
Tavi ua vaaj ua tsev rua nwg huv Tavi lub nroog hab npaaj ib lub chaw rua Vaajtswv lub swb xaab hab tsaa ib lub tsev ntaub ca rau lub swb xaab hov.
Mas Tavi has tas, “Dhau cov Levi lawm mas lwm tug tsw xob kwv Vaajtswv lub swb xaab tsua qhov Yawmsaub xaiv puab kwv Yawmsaub lub swb xaab hab ua koom rua nwg moog ib txhws.”
Tavi txawm hu cov Yixayee suavdawg tuaj txoos ua ke rua huv Yeluxalee es yuav moog coj Yawmsaub lub swb xaab lug ca rua ntawm lub chaw kws Tavi tub npaaj tau lawm.
Mas Tavi txhad sau Aloo cov tub hab cov Levi,
kws yog Khauha caaj ceg mas tau Uli‑ee ua tug thawj hab nwg cov kwvtij muaj ib puas neeg nkaum leej.
Melali caaj ceg tau Axaya ua tug thawj hab nwg cov kwvtij muaj ob puas neeg nkaum leej.
Kawsoo caaj ceg tau Yau‑ee ua tug thawj hab nwg cov kwvtij ib puas peb caug leej.
Elixafa caaj ceg tau Semaya ua tug thawj hab nwg cov kwvtij ob puas leej.
Heploo caaj ceg tau Eli‑ee ua tug thawj hab nwg cov kwvtij yim caum leej.
Uxi‑ee caaj ceg tau Aminanta ua tug thawj hab nwg cov kwvtij ib puas kaum ob leeg.
Mas Tavi hu Xantau hab Anpiyatha kws ua pov thawj hab cov Levi tuaj, yog Uli‑ee, Axaya, Yau‑ee, Semaya, Eli‑ee hab Aminanta,

hab has rua puab tas, “Mej yog Levi cov quas cum le thawj. Mej ca le ua kevcai tu mej hab mej cov kwvtij kuas dawb huv sub mej txhad moog coj tau Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv lub swb xaab lug rua ntawm lub chaw kws kuv tub npaaj tseg ca lawd.
Tub yog vem thawj zag hov mej tsw moog kwv mas Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv kev npau tawg txhad tshwm rua peb lawm, tsua qhov peb tsw tu lub swb xaab hab tsw ua lawv le kevcai.”
Mas cov pov thawj hab cov Levi txhad tu puab kuas dawb huv sub txhad moog coj tau Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv lub swb xaab lug.
Cov Levi txhad tuav ob tug laag kwv Vaajtswv lub swb xaab lawv le tej lug kws Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe has rua puab ua.

Tavi has kuas Levi cov thawj tsaa puab ib co kwvtij ua cov hu nkauj ntaus tej cuab yeej phim nkauj nrov, yog ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv hab nkauj nog ncaas luj hab npuaj nruag tooj lab, hab ua suab zoo sab xyiv faab.
Cov Levi txhad tsaa Yau‑ee tug tub Hemaa, hab nwg cov kwvtij, yog Npelekhiya tug tub Axas, hab ntawm Melali caaj ceg yog Khusaya tug tub Etha.

Hab puab tau tsaa puab cov kwvtij lug paab puab yog Xelakhiya, Ya‑axi‑ee, Semilamau, Yehi‑ee, Uni, Elia, Npenaya, Ma‑axeya, Mathithiya, Elifelehu hab Mineya, hab tsaa Aunpe Entoo hab Ye‑i‑ee ua cov zuv tej rooj loog.
Cov hu nkauj mas Hemaa, Axas hab Etha yuav npuaj nruag tooj lab hab.
Cov kws yuav ntaus nkauj nog ncaas luj lawv le lub suab Alamau yog Xekhaliya, Axi‑ee, Semilamau, Yehi‑ee, Uni, Elia, Ma‑axeya hab Npenaya.
Cov kws yuav ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv lawv le lub suab Semini yog Mathithiya, Elifelehu, Mineya, Aunpe Entoo, Ye‑i‑ee hab Axaxiya.
Khenaniya kws yog cov Levi tug thawj coj hu nkauj ua tug thawj coj hu nkauj tsua qhov nwg nkaag sab zoo.
Npelekhiya hab Eekhana ua cov zuv qhov rooj chaav tsev kws rau Vaajtswv lub swb xaab.

Cov kws yuav tshuab raaj xyu ua Vaajtswv lub swb xaab ntej yog Senpaniya, Yausafa, Nethanee, Amaxai, Xekhaliya, Npenaya hab Eliyexaw kws ua pov thawj. Aunpe Entoo hab Yehiya kuj ua cov zuv qhov rooj chaav tsev rau lub swb xaab.
Mas Tavi hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug hab cov thawj kws kaav ib txheeb leej tub rog txhad moog coj Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug ntawm Aunpe Entoo lub tsev xyiv faab hlo.
Vem Vaajtswv paab cov Levi kws kwv Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug, mas puab txhad muab xyaa tug txwv nyuj hab xyaa tug txwv yaaj tua xyeem rua Vaajtswv.

Tavi naav lub tsho ntaub maag zoo zoo hab cov Levi huvsw kws kwv lub swb xaab hab cov hu nkauj hab Khenaniya kws ua tug thawj coj hu nkauj puavleej naav tsho ntaub maag. Hab Tavi naav lub tsho ntaub maag efauj.

Yog le nuav cov Yixayee suavdawg coj Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug nce lug hab muaj suab qw suab raaj kub yaaj suab raaj xyu hab npuaj nruag tooj lab hab ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv hab nkauj nog ncaas luj ua nkauj nrov doog quas daj.
Mas thaus Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug lug tsua huv Tavi lub nroog lawd, Xa‑u tug ntxhais Mikhaa xauj qhov rais pum vaajntxwv Tavi dha seev cev hab ua sab xyiv faab, nwg txawm xob sab rua Tavi.
Puab coj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab lug txawb rua huv lub tsev ntaub kws Tavi tub tsaa ca lawd. Puab tua tsaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo rua ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag.
Thaus Tavi ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo taag lawd, nwg txawm tuav Yawmsaub lub npe foom koob moov rua cov pejxeem.
Hab nwg muab ib leeg ib lub ncuav, ib leeg ib daim nqaj hab ib lub ncuav txwv maab qhuav pub tsua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tsw has quaspuj quasyawg.
Hab Tavi tsaa cov Levi qee leej ua koom rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub swb xaab, kuas puab thov hab ua tsaug hab qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv.

Axas ua tug thawj, tug ob yog Xekhaliya, hab muaj Ye‑i‑ee, Semilamau, Yehi‑ee, Mathathiya, Elia, Npenaya, Aunpe Entoo hab Ye‑i‑ee ua cov ntaus nkauj nog ncaas luj hab nkauj nog ncaas miv. Axas yog tug kws npuaj nruag tooj lab,
Npenaya hab Yahaxi‑ee kws ua pov thawj ua tug tshuab raaj xyu ntawm Vaajtswv lub swb xaab sws cog lug txhua txhua zag moog le.
Nub ntawd yog thawj zag kws Tavi has kuas Axas hab nwg cov kwvtij hu nkauj ua tsaug rua Yawmsaub has tas,
Ca le ua Yawmsaub tsaug, ca le thov hu nwg lub npe, ca le pav nwg teg num rua txhua haiv tuabneeg.
Ca le hu nkauj rua nwg, hu nkauj qhuas nwg, ca le pav txug txhua yaam num phemfwj kws nwg ua.
Ca le khaav txug nwg lub npe kws dawb huv, ca cov kws nrhav Yawmsaub zoo sab xyiv faab.
Ca le nrhav Yawmsaub hab nrhav nwg tug zug. Nrhav nwg lub xubndag tsw tu le.

Yixayee kws yog Yawmsaub tug qhev tej caaj ceg 'e. hab Yakhauj cov tub ki kws Yawmsaub xaiv 'e, mej ca le ncu txug tej num phemfwj kws Yawmsaub tau ua, hab nwg tej txujci phemfwj hab tej lug kws nwg txav txem.
Nwg yog Yawmsaub, yog peb tug Vaajtswv. Nwg tej lug txav txem muaj nyob thoob plhawv huv nplajteb.
Nwg yeej ncu ntsoov nwg tej lug cog tseg moog ib txhws, yog tej lug kws nwg qha moog rua ib txheeb tam tuabneeg,
yog tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua Aplahaa, hab yog tej kws nwg yeem lug cog twv rua Yiha,
yog tej kws Vaajtswv cog lug ruaj nreeg ca rua Yakhauj ua kaab ke, yog cog rua Yixayee ua lug cog tseg moog ib txhws,
has tas, “Kuv yuav pub lub tebchaws Khana‑aa rua koj, ua mej qub txeeg qub teg moog le.”
Thaus puab tseed tsw muaj tuabneeg coob, yeej yog tsawg tsawg le tag, puab tsuas yog lug ua qhua nyob xwb,
tswv moog tswv lug rua haiv tuabneeg nuav rua haiv tuabneeg u, rua lub tebchaws nuav rua lub tebchaws u,
Yawmsaub tsw kheev leejtwg quab yuam puab, vem saib rua puab nwg txhad txwv tej vaajntxwv
has tas, “Tsw xob kov tej kws kuv laub roj tsaa lawd hab tsw xob ua le caag rua kuv cov xwbfwb cev kuv lug.”
Taag nrho thoob qaab ntuj ca le hu nkauj rua Yawmsaub, ca le pav nwg txujkev cawm dim ib nub dhau ib nub.
Ca le pav txug nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, pav txug nwg tej num phemfwj rua huv ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yog tug luj kawg hab tswm nyog qhuas heev, nwg txaus ntshai heev dua tej timtswv huvsw.
Tuabneeg tej timtswv huvsw puavleej yog txoov daab xwb, tassws Yawmsaub yog tug tswm lub ntuj.
Koob meej hab fwjchim meej mom nyob ntawm nwg xubndag, tug zug hab kev xyiv faab nyob huv nwg lub chaw nyob.
Txhua haiv tuabneeg txhua xeem 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas tas Yawmsaub muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab hab muaj zug.
Ca le qhuas tas Yawmsaub lub npe muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab kws tswm nyog qhuas kawg le, ca le coj tej kws xyeem tuaj rua ntawm nwg xubndag, ca le naav tej tsoog kws dawb huv pe hawm Yawmsaub.
Taag nrho lub nplajteb, ca le tshee nyo rua ntawm nwg xubndag. Lub nplajteb yeej nyob ruaj khov yuav tsw ua zug hlo le.
Lub ntuj ca le zoo sab, lub nplajteb ca le xyiv faab. Ca le has rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws tas, “Yawmsaub ua vaajntxwv kaav.”
Dej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv ca le qw nrov ntsug qeeg. Tej teb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv ca le qw zoo sab.
Tej xyoob ntoo huv haav zoov yuav hu nkauj xyiv faab rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, vem yog nwg yuav lug txav txem rua nplajteb.
Ca le ua Yawmsaub tsaug vem nwg zoo kawg. Nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.

Hab mej ca le has tas, “Au Vaajtswv kws cawm peb dim, thov koj tso peb dim, thov qaws peb hab cawm peb dim huv txhua lub tebchaws rov lug es peb yuav ua tsaug koj lub npe kws dawb huv hab khaav qhov kws peb qhuas koj.”
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv ib txwm thau u lug moog ib txhws. Mas cov pejxeem huvsw has tas, “Amee” hab qhuas Yawmsaub.
Tavi txawm ca Axas hab nwg cov kwvtij nyob ntawm Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug es ua num hov ntawd moog lawv le kws naj nub cheem tsum ua,
hab Aunpe Entoo hab nwg cov kwvtij rau caum yim leej kuj nyob ntawd. Yentuthu tug tub Aunpe Entoo hab Hauxa ua cov zuv tej rooj loog.
Tavi kuas pov thawj Xantau hab nwg cov kwvtij kws ua pov thawj nyob ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub kws nyob ntawm lub chaw sab pe Yawmsaub huv lub moos Kinpe‑oo,

es puab yuav ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem rua Yawmsaub sau lub thaaj kws hlawv xyeem thaus taagkig hab thaus yuav tsaus ntuj moog le, lawv le kws tub sau ca huvsw rua huv Yawmsaub tej kevcai kws tau has rua cov Yixayee.
Hemaa hab Yentuthu hab cov kws raug xaiv npe nrug puab nyob hov, yog cov kws yuav ua Yawmsaub tsaug tsua qhov nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Hemaa hab Yentuthu muaj raaj xyu hab nruag npuaj tooj lab kws yuav ntaus, hab muaj cuab yeej kws ntaus phim nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub. Yentuthu cov tub raug tsaa ua cov zuv tej rooj loog.
Mas cov pejxeem suavdawg txawm nyag rov moog rua nyag tsev, mas Tavi kuj rov qaab moog tsev hab foom koob moov rua nwg tsev tuabneeg.

Thaus Tavi nyob ruaj huv nwg lub tsev Tavi has rua Nathaa kws ua xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug tas, “Koj swm saib, kuv nyob huv lub tsev kws xuas ntoo cab ua huas Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug nyob huv lub tsev ntaub xwb.”
Mas Nathaa has rua Tavi tas, “Koj ca le moog ua txhua yaam kws koj lub sab xaav ua, tsua qhov Vaajtswv nrug nraim koj.”
Tassws mo ntawd Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua Nathaa tas,
“Ca le moog has rua kuv tug qhev Tavi tas, ‘Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Koj tsw xob ua lub tuam tsev rua kuv nyob.
Tsua qhov txwj thaus kuv coj cov Yixayee tawm lug txug nub nua, kuv tsw txeev nyob huv tsev, kuv tsuas yog tshais lub tsev ntaub rua hov u hov nuav hab tshais lub chaw nyob rua hov u hov nuav.

Txhua qhov kws kuv nrug cov Yixayee suavdawg moog, kuv puas tau has ib lu lug rua cov Yixayee ib tug thawj twg kws kuv khaiv kuas saib kuv haiv tuabneeg has tas, “Ua caag mej tsw ua ib lub tsev ntoo cab rua kuv?” ’

Vem le nuav nwgnuav koj ca le has rua kuv tug qhev Tavi tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus has le nuav tas, Kuv coj koj tawm huv lub tshaav zaub kws koj yug yaaj lug ua tug thawj kaav kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee.

Koj moog hovtwg los kuv nrug nraim koj qhov ntawd, hab kuv rhuav tshem koj cov yeeb ncuab huvsw ntawm koj lub xubndag moog. Kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj koob meej ib yaam le tej kws muaj koob meej luj huv nplajteb nuav.

Kuv yuav tu ib lub chaw ca rua kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee nyob, hab kuv yuav muab puab cog ca nyob ruaj khov rua huv lub chaw kws yog puab tug, tsw muaj leejtwg yuav tuaj zwg puab. Tej tuabneeg limham ndais ntuj yuav tsw tuaj lws puab dua le lawm yaam le yaav taag lug,

txwj thaus kuv tsaa cov thawj kaav kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee. Kuv yuav yuam koj cov yeeb ncuab huvsw kuas swb hlo. Dua le ntawd mas kuv has rua koj tas, Yawmsaub yuav pub kuas koj muaj caaj ceg ua vaaj moog le.
Thaus koj noob nyoog taag moog nrug koj tej laug nyob lawd, kuv yuav tsaa ib tug tub kws koj yug lug nyob koj chaw hab kuv yuav tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav ruaj khov.
Nwg yog tug kws yuav ua lub tuam tsev rua kuv mas kuv yuav tsaa nwg lub zwm txwv nyob moog ib txhws.
Kuv yuav ua nwg leej txwv hab nwg yuav ua kuv tug tub. Kuv yuav tsw muab kuv txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rhu ntawm nwg moog, yaam le kws kuv tau rhu ntawm tug kws nyob ua koj ntej.
Kuv yuav tsaa nwg saib kuv cov tuabneeg hab kuv lub tebchaws moog ib txhws hab nwg lub zwm txwv yuav nyob ruaj khov moog ib txhws.’ ”
Nathaa has tej lug nuav huvsw rua Tavi lawv le tej kws nwg ua yug quas toog pum.

Tes vaajntxwv Tavi txawm nkaag rua huv lub tsev ntaub nyob quas tsawg ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag mas has tas, “Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, kuv yog leejtwg hab kuv caaj ceg yog leejtwg es koj coj kuv lug txug txwj nuav?

Au Vaajtswv, tej nuav yog tej yaam miv miv ntawm koj lub qhov muag xwb. Koj tseed has tseg txug kuv kws yog koj tug qhev caaj ceg rua ntau xyoo tom hauv ntej. Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj tseed pum tas kuv yog ib tug kws tswm txaj kawg.
Kuv Tavi yuav has daabtsw ntxwv rua koj txug qhov kws koj tau pub koob meej rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev? Tsua qhov koj yeej paub kuv kws yog koj tug qhev.
Au Yawmsaub, vem koj saib rua koj tug qhev hab vem yog lawv le koj lub sab nyam koj txhad ua tej num luj nuav huvsw hab qha tej num luj nuav huvsw rua kuv paub.
Au Yawmsaub, tsw muaj leejtwg zoo cuag le koj. Dhau koj lawm tsw muaj dua ib tug vaajtswv txwj le peb lub qhov ntsej tau nov.

Haiv tuabneeg twg huv lub nplajteb nuav yuav zoo thooj le koj haiv tuabneeg Yixayee kws Vaajtswv koj moog txhwv lug ua koj haiv tuabneeg? Koj ua rua koj lub npe nto moo quas lug vem yog koj ua tej yaam kws luj hab txaus ntshai kawg txhad lawv tau tej haiv tuabneeg kuas tswv ntawm koj haiv tuabneeg hauv ntej moog, yog koj haiv tuabneeg kws koj txhwv ntawm Iyi tebchaws lug.
Hab koj tswm tsaa koj haiv tuabneeg Yixayee lug ua koj le teej tug moog ib txhws, hab Yawmsaub koj tau ua puab tug Vaajtswv.
“Au Yawmsaub, nwgnuav thov kuas koj tej lug kws koj has tseg txug kuv kws yog koj tug qhev hab has txug kuv caaj ceg nyob ruaj moog ib txhws hab thov koj ua lawv le kws koj tau has ca lawd.

Koj lub npe yuav nyob ruaj khov hab yuav raug qhuas moog ib txhws has tas, ‘Yixayee tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nwg yeej yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv ntaag,’ hab Tavi kws yog koj tug qhev caaj ceg yuav nyob ruaj khov ntawm koj lub xubndag moog le.

Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, koj tub qha rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev paub tas, koj yuav tswm kuv kuas muaj caaj ceg ua vaaj moog le. Vem le nuav kuv kws yog koj tug qhev txhad le muaj cuabkaav tsaa ncauj thov koj.
Au Yawmsaub, koj yeej los yog Vaajtswv, hab koj tau cog tej lug zoo nuav rua koj tug qhev.

Yog le nuav nwgnuav thov koj txaus sab foom koob moov rua koj tug qhev caaj ceg kuas nyob ruaj rua ntawm koj lub xubndag moog ib txhws. Au Yawmsaub, yaam twg kws koj foom koob moov rua yaam ntawd yeej tau txais koob moov ib txhws.”
Dhau hov Tavi ntaus yeej cov Filixatee hab tswjfwm puab. Tavi txeeb tau lub moos Ka hab tej zej zog ib ncig lub moos hov ntawm cov Filixatee txhais teg.
Nwg ntaus yeej cov Mau‑a mas cov Mau‑a kuj zwm rua Tavi hab coj hov txhua chaw tuaj them se rua nwg.
Tavi kuj ntaus yeej Hantantexaw kws ua vaajntxwv huv lub moos Xaunpa ncaaj moog txug lub moos Hama, yog lub swjhawm kws Hantantexaw moog tsaa cov tub rog zuv ntawm tug nam dej Yufeti.

Tavi txeeb tau cov tsheb ua rog ntawm Hantantexaw ib txheeb lub hab cov tub rog caij neeg xyaa txheeb leej hab cov tub rog moog kwtaw ob vaam leej, hab Tavi txav cov neeg kws hai tsheb ua rog leeg rawg huvsw, tseg kuas txaus hai ib puas lub tsheb ua rog xwb.
Thaus cov tuabneeg Alaa kws nyob huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka tuaj paab Xaunpa tug vaajntxwv Hantantexaw, mas Tavi tua cov Alaa ob vaam ob txheeb leej.
Tavi tsaa ib co tub rog zuv kaav cov Alaa huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka. Cov Alaa zwm rua Tavi hab coj hov txhua chaw tuaj them se rua nwg. Yawmsaub pub Tavi kov yeej rua txhua qhov kws nwg moog.
Hab Tavi txeeb tau daim phaj kub kws thaiv hauv sab kws Hantantexaw cov tub teg tub taw coj, hab coj moog rua lub nroog Yeluxalee.

Hab Tavi txeeb tau tooj lab ntau ntau le ntawm lub moos Thiha hab lub moos Khu kws yog Hantantexaw tej moos. Mas Xalaumoo muab cov tooj lab hov ua lub rhawv dej tooj lab hab cov ncej hab tej pestwj swv kws yog tooj lab.
Thaus vaajntxwv Tho‑u huv lub moos Hama nov tas Tavi tau ntaus yeej lub moos Xaunpa tug vaajntxwv Hantantexaw cov tub rog huvsw lawm,

Tho‑u txawm khaiv nwg tug tub Hantaulaa moog cuag vaajntxwv Tavi moog has ib lu lug tshaav ntuj zoo sab rua nwg tsua qhov kws Tavi tau ua rog hab kov yeej Hantantexaw lawm, tsua qhov Hantantexaw pheej ua rog rua Tho‑u. Mas Tho‑u xaa ntau yaam kws xuas nyaj xuas kub xuas tooj lab ua tuaj pub rua Tavi.

Vaajntxwv Tavi muab txhua yaam nuav xyeem pub rua Yawmsaub, hab muab tej nyaj kub kws nwg muab tau ntawm txhua haiv tuabneeg kws nwg kov yeej xyeem pub rua Yawmsaub, yog tej kws nwg txeeb tau ntawm cov Entoo, cov Mau‑a, cov Aamoo, cov Filixatee hab cov Amalej.
Xeluya  tug tub Anpisai moog tua cov Entoo tuag ib vaam yim txheeb leej huv lub Haav Ntsev.
Hab nwg tso tub rog zuv kaav tebchaws Entoo. Cov tuabneeg Entoo suavdawg txhad zwm rua Tavi. Yawmsaub pub Tavi kov yeej rua txhua qhov kws nwg moog.
Mas Tavi kaav taag nrho cov Yixayee huvsw. Tavi ua ncaaj ua nceeg hab ua zoo rua nwg cov pejxeem suavdawg.
Xeluya tug tub Yau‑a ua thawj kaav tub rog. Ahilu tug tub Yehausafa ua tug kws sau ntawv keeb kwm.
Ahithu tug tub Xantau hab Anpiyatha tug tub Ahimelej  ua pov thawj. Sasas ua tug tub sau ntawv.
Yehauyanta tug tub Npenaya kaav cov Khelethi hab cov Pelethi.  Hab Tavi cov tub ua cov num tswv luj kws ua vaajntxwv tej num.
Dhau ntawd lug cov Aamoo tug vaajntxwv Naha txawm tuag mas nwg tug tub ua vaajntxwv nyob nwg chaw.

Tavi txawm has tas, “Kuv yuav ua ncaaj ua zoo rua Naha tug tub Hanu tsua qhov nwg txwv tau ua ncaaj ua zoo rua kuv.” Tavi txhad tso cov tub xaa xuv moog nplig Hanu sab vem nwg txwv tuag lawm. Mas Tavi cov tub teg tub taw txhad moog cuag Hanu huv cov Aamoo tebchaws es yuav moog nplig nwg sab.

Tassws cov Aamoo cov thawj has rua Hanu tas, “Koj xaav has tas Tavi xaa tuabneeg tuaj nplig koj tes yog nwg fwm koj txwv nua lov? Sub tsw yog nwg cov tub teg tub taw tuaj cuag koj es yuav saib hab tshuaj saib hab rhuav peb lub tebchaws.”
Hanu txawm nteg Tavi cov tub teg tub taw hab muab puab fwj txwv chais hab muab puab lub tsho txav txwj ntawm lub ntsaag rua yaav huv pov tseg, hab muab puab tso moog,

tes puab txawm rov qaab lug. Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Tavi paub txug cov tuabneeg nuav mas nwg txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog tog puab tsua qhov puab raug kev txaaj muag heev. Vaajntxwv txhad has tas, “Mej ca le su ntawm lub moos Yelikhau moog txug thaus mej cov fwj txwv tuaj tsaiv le maav lug.”

Thaus cov Aamoo paub tas puab ua rua Tavi ntxub puab lawm, Hanu hab cov Aamoo txawm xaa ib txheeb talaa nyaj  moog ndav cov tsheb ua rog hab cov tub rog caij neeg ntawm Alaanahala‑i  tebchaws hab ntawm lub moos Alaama‑akha hab lub moos Xaunpa.

Puab ndav cov tsheb ua rog peb vaam ob txheeb lub hab ndav tug vaajntxwv huv lub moos Ma‑akha hab nwg cov tub rog, mas puab tuaj ua yeej ze rua ntawm lub moos Mentenpa. Hab cov Aamoo txhwj tub rog ntawm puab tej moos tuaj ua ke es tuaj ua rog.
Thaus Tavi nov tej nuav lawd nwg txawm khaiv Yau‑a hab cov tub rog sab tuab huvsw moog.
Cov Aamoo kuj tawm tuaj npaaj tub rog rua ntawm txujkev kws nkaag rua huv lub moos, hab cov vaajntxwv kws tuaj mas puab nyob dua ib caag tom xub tsuag.

Thaus Yau‑a pum tas luas npaaj tub rog rua tom nwg hauv ntej hab npaaj tub rog rua tom nwg qub qaab, nwg txawm xaiv paab tub rog Yixayee kws txawj tshaaj plawg qee leej hab tso puab moog tiv cov Alaa.
Dua le cov nwg muab cob rua nwg tug kwv Anpisai kaav mas cov nuav npaaj moog tiv cov Aamoo.
Yau‑a has tas, “Yog cov Alaa muaj zug heev dhau kuv, koj ca le tuaj paab kuv, huas yog cov Aamoo muaj zug heev dhau koj mas kuv yuav tuaj paab koj.
Ca le ua sab tuab, peb ca le ua sab luj yaam le txwvneej yawg paab peb haiv tuabneeg hab paab peb tug Vaajtswv tej moos. Thov Yawmsaub ua lawv le nwg pum zoo.”
Ua le hov mas Yau‑a hab cov tub rog kws nrug nwg txhad le txeem moog ze ua rog rua cov Alaa, mas cov Alaa txhad tswv thim quas zug tom nwg hauv ntej.
Thaus cov Aamoo pum cov Alaa tswv lawm tes puab txawm tswv ntawm Yau‑a tug kwv Anpisai hauv ntej ib yaam nkaus hab nkaag moog rua huv lub moos. Tes Yau‑a txawm rov qaab lug rua Yeluxalee.
Thaus cov Alaa pum tas puab swb cov Yixayee lawm puab txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog coj cov tuabneeg Alaa kws nyob saab dej Yufeti nub tuaj tawm tuaj. Hantantexaw tug thawj rog Saufa coj puab kev.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg has rua Tavi paub mas nwg sau zog cov Yixayee suavdawg tuaj ua ke hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog cuag puab hab npaaj tub rog tiv puab. Thaus Tavi npaaj tub rog tiv cov Alaa mas puab kuj ua rog rua nwg.
